Military Service #54-05C-9301 Clearance Level Gamma Begin Transmission
Be advised, Chinese field operations in occupied Anchorage in state of flux. Primary field command post appears to have moved from Elemndorf AFB to civilian refinery site, effecting a southward shift in forward line of engagement. Intercepted radio communications suggest failure of Operation Red Harvest and capture of USMC personnel. Continued artillery barrage from Chugach Overlook suggests veracity of this intelligence. High importance, be advised. Eyewitness account of Dragoon units outfitted in previously-unknown infantry armor. This armor appears to be a more recent prototype of the same HG stealth armor captured from enemy infiltrators at the Hoover Sabotage. Presence of Dragoon units suggest that General Jingwei may already have relocated to Anchorage. Stand by for confirmation of report.
ESP.TRADUIT:
军方服务系统 #54-05C-9301 许可等级3 报头
根据情报，在安克雷奇的中国部队行动处在变化之中。地面总指挥部已经从埃勒姆多空军基地迁移到民用精炼厂, 使前线向南移。截获的电台信号证实了红色丰收行动的失败和美国海军陆战队人员被俘。从楚加奇监察哨来的持续炮火遮断证明了情报的真实性。 注意，高度重要。目击报告声称龙骑兵单位装备了从未见过的新型步兵装甲。这种装甲似乎是在“胡佛动乱”中缴获的HG潜行装甲的最新样品。龙骑兵单位的出现说明精卫将军可能已经抵达安克雷奇。静候确认。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
1.1c: Atmospheric Counter-Espionage Action
In compliance with Legislative Act 21-0 of 2072, Overlook AFS has been supplied with atmospheric scatter payloads.
This payload is primed and loaded identically to regular ballistic ammunition, but must be fired in strict accordance with directives provided by the ranking Intel Officer.
ESP.TRADUIT:
1.1c: 气象台-间谍活动
遵照2072年的21-0号法案，已向监察哨美国战地服务团提供大气驱散载荷。
这种载荷已装雷管，使用标准炸药，但开火时必须严格依照高级情报长官的指令。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
1.1b: Diversionary tactics in Martial Evacuation
In the event of a military evacuation of the City of Anchorage, Overlook AFS personnel may be called upon to discharge flares. Primary flare function will be to relay short-wave radio messages in the event of wide-scale comm failure.
Flares may be used to simulate hostile exchanges only under direct order of Elemndorf AFB Commanding Officer.
ESP.TRADUIT:
1.1b: 军事撤退中的牵制战术
假使安克雷奇市采取军事撤退，可召集监察哨美国战地服务团的人员释放信号弹，信号弹的主要功能是在发生大规模通讯故障时转发短波电台信号。
信号弹可用于冒充敌方通讯，但必须有埃勒姆多空军基地指挥官的直接命令。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
1.1a: Cooperative Action w/regional NORAD site
In the event of NORAD deployment or training exercises from Fire Island AFS, personnel will be called upon to enact Cooperative protocol routines as dictated by joint-operations Commanding Officer installed at Elemndorf AFB.
The primary function of long-range artillery in the event of a inter-continental ballistic strike is to provide localized fire support against hostile targets on potential intercept courses.
In a live-fire deployment situation, Executive Branch compliance is implied, and the AFS Commanding Officer has authorization to fire upon civilian transports refusing to provide ample identification upon first contact.
ESP.TRADUIT:
1.1a: 与北美防空司令部当地机构联合行动
一旦北美防空司令部从火岛美国战地服务团开始部署或训练演习，据就职于埃勒姆多空军基地的联合作战指挥官口述将召集人员拟定协作草案程序。
在洲际导弹攻击的过程中远程火炮的基本功能是提供局部火力支援以防止敌方目标潜在的拦截可能性。
在实弹部署时，行政部门默许，美国战地服务团的指挥官有权向在首次通讯中拒绝提供充分身份证明的民用运输工具开火。
已解码的中国军队通讯信息

ESP.ORIGINAL:
...//Begin Transcription//... 34UJCNM requisition papers have been submitted for anti-air surveillance and defense systems. To make security of Eastern cliffs, I have submitted papers third time to field command. 39KJKLm18*(.
Making all due respect, honorable Dragoons mission that took *CH3 facility in our 2AN3! attacks made use of Eastern cliffs. KJ(*D12..++ DFK989KK. Leaving this non-defensible is dangerous, as American attackers could make same use of Eastern cliffs. Further patrols are posted, but we outpost remain vulnerable to airborne drop tactics. 3KLJDR8-tek systems of surveillance and defense can help ensure against such vulnerable (state of being).
398KDI consider this request, sir. Re9*k of Chinese Republic.
...//End Transcription//...
ESP.TRADUIT:
...//翻译开始//... 34UJCNM 需求文件已提交至反空中监察和防卫系统。为保东部山崖安全，我已向野指三次提交报告。39KJKLm18*(.
恕我直言，光荣的龙骑兵利用东部山崖占领我们 2AN3! 区内 *CH3 设施的任务。 KJ(*D12..++ DFK989KK. 令此地缺乏防御极度危险，因为美方攻击部队同样可以利用东部山崖。已增派巡逻队，但我方前哨仍受空降威胁。 3KLJDR8-监视和防卫技术系统可协助加强（目前的）脆弱状况。
398KDI 请酌此项要求，长官。中华共和国 Re9*k
...//翻译结束//...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Entry 0527
Sim version 7-36-081 was scrapped last week after Chase ran through it himself. Said it didn't "feel right." It was eventually determined he was referring to hardware issues, not anything to do with the software.
Techs have been making modifications on the chair, but some ongoing issues remain problematic. Requests to administration to provide detailed schematics and hardware history have been neglected. Questions about the particular external interface requirements remain unanswered. Techs will attempt to compensate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记录 0527
上周，蔡斯亲自运行7-36-081版本的模拟程序后，这个版本被放弃了。他说“感觉不对”。最后发现他所说的是硬件问题，和软件没有关系。
技术人员们正在调整那只椅子，但是还是有一些问题。提供详细设计图和硬件历史的要求被上级忽略了。关于特定外部接口的要求的问题还是没有回答。技术人员将会继续尝试。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Entry 0540
Sim back up and running after another few days of changes. Chase is running everyone ragged, making tweaks here and there. The sim is, without any shadow of a doubt, divorced from reality. I've never seen the classified military reports, but some of the stuff Chase has added to the sim? There's no way it happened like that. Version 7-36-099 was scrapped after Chase decided his face didn't look just right. I realize progress reports aren't the place for this, but there are concerns that the man is losing it. No one confronts him because everyone is scared. After West-Tek dropped off the grid, there were lots of rumors about the military commandeering private contractors, and no one wants to give Chase a reason to do that here. But really, what's the point in running this sim over and over and over? Any tactical data was mined months ago.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记录 0540
模拟程序在又修改了几天之后，做好了备份开始运行。蔡斯让大家到处修改，每个人都十分疲惫了。 这个模拟程序毫无疑问的和现实非常不同。虽然我从来没读过机密的军方报告，但是蔡斯在模拟程序里加的一些东西是不可能发生的。 7-36-099版本程序被放弃了，因为蔡斯说他的脸在程序中看起来有些不对劲。我知道进度报告里不应该写这些，但是有人认为蔡斯快疯了。没人敢面对他，因为每个人都很害怕。在West-Tek销声匿迹以后，出现了不少军方将会强制征用其他私人承包公司的传言，谁也不想让蔡斯有借口对我们下手。但是，究竟为什么一遍又一遍地运行模拟程序呢？所有的战术信息几个月以前就采集完了。

Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : threatening EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : threatening EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : worried his comrade is flipping out EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : worried his comrade is flipping out EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything well with you? We're still busy cataloging all the gear you uncovered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你都好吧？我们还在忙着把你发现的装备分类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dropped by for another visit? Bring any good tech with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么有空过来看看？有没有带什么新鲜玩意来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. We're still picking up the pieces from the... incident.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。我们还在收拾事故的…烂摊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've saved us. Sibley would've had the upper hand if you hadn't been here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你救了我们。如果你没来，西布利就赢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be here for a while, cataloging all the tech. If you need anything, you come see us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们过会就到这里，对所有的科技进行分类。如果你有需要就来找我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may not be one of us, but you're the next best thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你不是我们的一员，但你对我们很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for helping. Sibley would've gotten the best of me if you weren't here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你的帮助。如果你没来西布利就击败我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a damn shame about Olin, but she died well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们失去奥林真他妈的可惜，但她死得很安详。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been an honor working with you. I don't think I've ever seen bravery like that on any battlefield.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与你并肩作战是我的荣幸。我在任何战场上都没见过像你这么勇敢的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully, after we mop up the mess in Anchorage, we can get together and have a couple of beers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望在安克雷奇行动结束后，我们可以聚聚，喝上一杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage!
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage!

ESP.ORIGINAL: All that's left is General Jingwei. We take him out, and we've won Anchorage. Let's do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就剩下精卫将军了。我们干掉他，安克雷奇行动就大获全胜了。我们出发吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it! Throw that switch and we can send in the T-51b's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了！扔出那个开关我们就可以派出T-51b部队了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now it's just you and me. Let's go take down the Pulse Field!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，现在只有你和我了。让我们去拿下脉冲场吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get in there and finish this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们前进，打赢这场仗吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Power Armored Soldier [07004AB4] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll get this place opened up in no time! Stand back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们马上就要解放这块地区了！退后点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Power Armored Soldier [07004AB4] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything okay? Nothing's changed out here, so you can't be done...
ESP.TRADUIT: 进展如何？局面还没有改观，你还不能放弃…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fool! You will be crushed by the might of the Chinese Army!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这蠢货！你会被中国军队打成蜂窝的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Jingwei [070018D2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, take whatever you like. I never break my promises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请便，想要什么就拿什么。我会遵守诺言的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's get this door open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我们来打开这扇门吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should be able to access the restricted areas now. Let's hope it's been worth all this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在可以进入禁区了。希望我们不虚此行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job making it through that simulation. All you have to do now is open the Armory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能通过模拟，干得好。现在你要做的就是打开军火库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, as agreed, you get your share. Feel free to take whatever you want. If our records are right, there's plenty for all of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后，根据我们的协议，你将得到你应得的报酬。想要什么就拿什么吧。如果我们的记录没错的话，里面的东西够我们所有人的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've hit the targets, now the only thing left is the refinery. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你击中了目标，现在只剩下精炼厂了。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The objective's in sight, soldier! Your place is out there on the field!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看见目标了，士兵！前进吧，士兵，你属于那片战场！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There better be somethin' good behind that door...
ESP.TRADUIT: 门后面最好有些好东西…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what are you waiting for? Let's get this door open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你们还在等什么？我们来打开这扇门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack on the Mining Town is in progress, sir. I'll give you a new update when the objective is complete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前正在进攻矿镇，长官。当任务完成后我会向你报告最新战况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mining Town is crawling with Commie forces, sir. We're holding up here for the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中共盘踞在矿镇，长官。目前我们正守在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Disgust
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 现在矿镇已被攻克，长官。我们正等待你的最新指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attacking the Listening Post as ordered, sir. I'll give you a new update when the objective is complete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 按计划进攻监听站，长官。当任务完成后我会向你报告最新进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Listening Post is up ahead, sir. I can smell the Reds from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 监听站就在前面，长官。我在这里都能感觉到红军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Disgust
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listening Post secured, sir. Awaiting new orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们占领了监听站，长官。等待新的指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attacking the Ice Camp as ordered, sir. I'll update you once the objective is completed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 按计划进攻冰雪营地，长官。当任务完成后我会向你报告最新进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ice Camp's right around the bend, sir. We're holding up here for the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绕过那道弯就到冰雪营地了，长官。目前我们正守在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ice Camp secured, sir. Awaiting further orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们占领了冰雪营地，长官。等待新的指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your orders for the Strike Team, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请向突击组下命令，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm on my way out, sir.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest Comment (NAM2) : a relieved soldier on his way back to HQ EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest Comment (NAM2) : order signaling he is ready to receive his assignment EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sergeant wants to speak with you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700BA28]DLC02StrikeTeamOff) DLC02StrikeTeamOff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sergeant Montgomery wants to talk to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蒙哥马利中士想和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700BA28]DLC02StrikeTeamOff) DLC02StrikeTeamOff EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, thank you for responding to our distress call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，感谢你回应我们的求救信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, follow me. I'll take you to Protector McGraw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，跟着我。我会带你去见护卫麦格劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the backup? Great. Just great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来帮忙的？太好了，真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, follow me. I'll take you to Protector McGraw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，跟着我。我会带你去见护卫麦格劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the backup? Great. Just great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来帮忙的？太好了，真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, follow me. I'll take you to Protector McGraw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，跟着我。我会带你去见护卫麦格劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, come this way. And be careful what you touch - some of this equipment is rather delicate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请走这边。请小心你碰到的东西 — 这些装备都是很精密的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : grudgingly deferential EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you. Keep your weapons holstered, your hands to yourself, and your mouth shut. Follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，把你的武器收好，放规矩点，闭上嘴。跟我来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell are you, and what do you think you're doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是谁，来这里做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're here to help? Fine, then put this on, get in the chair, and we'll run the simulation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来帮忙的？好，那穿上这个，坐在那椅子上，我们来运行模拟程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got the suit, so put it on and get in the simulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有套装了，快穿上，然后坐到模拟器里去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: So this thing is some kind of training sim, near as we can figure. Guess you can tell us more when you come out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话说回来这东西是种高真实度的模拟训练装备。我想你出来后会告诉我们你的感受的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, let's move it. I ain't got all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点啊。我可没那么多时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You getting in there, or what?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on. I'll show you to the command room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点。我会带你去指挥室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the one Morrill sent down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说你就是莫里尔派来的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Except you're not one of us, are you? I'll have to have a little chat with Morrill about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是我们中的一员吧？我得去和莫里尔谈下这事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... you do have that computer there on your wrist. Hmph. I can see now that Morrill made the right call. Maybe you can be useful after all...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…你的手腕上确实有个电脑。现在我想莫里尔的决定是对的。说不定你会对我们有用…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the one Morrill sent down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说你就是莫里尔派来的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be perfectly honest -- I'd trust a Wastelander to shine my Power Armor, and even that's pushing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是很诚实正派的 — 我相信一个废土客可以帮我擦亮动力装甲，即使是勉强的也没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... you do have that computer there on your wrist. Hmph. I can see now that Morrill made the right call. Maybe you can be useful after all...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…你的手腕上确实有个电脑。现在我想莫里尔的决定是对的。说不定你会对我们有用…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, Wastelander. I'm not sure what brings you here, but we don't like surprise visits from the local populace. You're lucky you weren't killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，废土客。我不大清楚你为什么来这里，但我们不喜欢当地平民擅闯此地。你没被打死算是走运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... Maybe there's more to you than the average rubble dweller, hmm? That computer there on your wrist...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…也许你会比那些呆头呆脑的平民好一点吧？看你手腕上戴的电脑…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you can be useful to us after all...
ESP.TRADUIT: 说不定你会对我们有用呢…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a pre-war research facility. There's technology to be had, and I am determined to have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一座战前的研究设施。里面有种科技，我决心要得到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, it's locked up tight. As far as we can tell, it's linked into some kind of simulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，它被牢牢锁上了。据我们所知，它被连接在某种模拟器上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we can't access the simulator, because we lack the proper interface. Your little computer there is exactly what we're looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能进入模拟器，因为我们缺少适当的操作界面。你那件小电脑正是我们要找的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I'll make you a deal. You access the simulator and get us into the rest of this base, and I'll give you a cut of what we find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们来做个交易。你进入模拟器，带我们进入这个基地，我就把找到的东西分一份给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Payment for Services Rendered." You help us, and we'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: “交易达成。”你帮了我们，我们也会帮你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've said my piece. If you're interested in assisting, follow Sibley to the simulation pod. Olin will help get you jacked into the sim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说完了。如果你有兴趣帮忙的话，跟西布利去模拟舱。奥林会帮你进入模拟程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the one Morrill sent down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说来你就是莫里尔派来的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you've got half a brain in that head. You could be useful to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你不要这么心不在焉。你可能对我们有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head inside, soldier. Report to McGraw and then get back out here to help us fortify these defenses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进去吧，士兵。去向麦格劳报到，再回来这里帮助我们加强防御工事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Protector McGraw's inside, Sir, like I said. You'll want to speak to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说过了，护卫麦格劳在里面，先生。你得和他谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Protector McGraw's inside, Ma'am, like I said. You'll want to speak to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说过了，护卫麦格劳在里面，女士。你得和他谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work out there, soldier. Thanks for the back-up, but where's the rest of your detachment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮，士兵。谢谢你支援我，但你的其他队员哪去了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head on into the base and talk to McGraw. I'll let him know you're coming. Don't worry, they won't shoot you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进基地去和麦格劳谈谈。我会告诉他你来了。别担心，他们不会向你开枪的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you have been any more useless out there? You don't deserve to wear that armor after that display! Explain yourself, soldier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在那边没事干吗？从你之前的表现来看，你还不够资格穿那件装甲！好好解释一下，士兵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now who the hell are you, and what do you think you're doing wearing that armor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你到底是谁，还有为什么穿着那件装甲？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me one good reason why I shouldn't put you down right now, outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一个不杀你的理由，外来人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't think for one second I didn't see what you're wearing. If you hadn't actually helped out here, I'd have put you down along with these mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别以为我看不出你这身打扮是做什么的。如果你在这里碍手碍脚的，我就把你的尸体堆在变种人的上面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got about three seconds to explain yourself, outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有3秒钟时间解释一下在做什么，外来人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right local, mind explaining what you're doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，本地人，解释一下你在这里做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damned guard detail! That sounded like a good ruckus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的防卫细节！听起来像一堆废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : Soldier addressing comrade EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can go ahead and stop right there. Who the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以向前走，在那里停下。你到底是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : Guarding a door. Gruff. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well? You headed down or not?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : Guarding a door. Gruff. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a little busy right now!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morrill will explain at the base. Focus on those mutants for now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫里尔会在基地向你解释。现在集中精神对付那些变种人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stick with us until we make it through to the base!
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我们一起去基地！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take that elevator and report in to Defender Sibley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坐电梯去向守卫西布利报到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think Defender Sibley's going to want to talk with you. Take that elevator down into the base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想守卫西布利要和你谈谈。坐电梯到基地中去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defender Morrill's going to want to talk with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 守卫莫里尔想和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stow the chit-chat and let's take out those guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，我们去除掉那些机枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your eyes peeled for Commies. They're around, I can smell 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心中共。他们就在附近，我能感觉到他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this, a break? Keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是干嘛，想休息？继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn this place is swarming with Reds. I almost didn't make it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，这周围到处都是红军。我差点没命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have time for this... just get inside the base and meet me at the rendezvous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没时间了…进入那基地，在约定地点与我见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No time for talk. Get inside that base and meet me at the rendezvous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没时间谈了。进入那基地，在约定地点与我见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll meet you at the rendezvous. Now go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在约定地点与你见面。现在去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn fine work you did taking out those guns. Damn fine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你除掉那些机枪真是太他妈的好了！真他妈的好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The General is waiting to speak to you... and he hates waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将军正等着你和说话…而且…他不喜欢久等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop gawking at me and get going, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别傻看着我，去干活吧，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lieutenant Morgan will give you all the details. Carry on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摩根中尉会告诉你所有细节。去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got a job to do, soldier. Now hop to it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有活要干了，士兵。快去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you're in charge of Patterson's Suicide Squad, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么…你是帕特森敢死队的头头，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what can the Intelligence Corps do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么…有什么需要情报部队效劳的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope the operation is going well.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd get over to the map and listen to the General's briefing if I were you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我是你，我会去仔细查看一下地图，还有听一下将军的作战指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should be the last of them, and the last of the bombing runs on our guys, thanks to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那应该就是最后一个敌军了，我们不用再担心敌人的炸弹了，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to order our men back to the Field H.Q. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算命令我们的部下回到总部阵地。在那里见面吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work. They've been rolling those Chimeras all over us for months... good to see 'em out of commission for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。这几个月来他们一直用奇美拉坦克攻击我们…很开心能看到它们消停一会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to order the Strike Team back to the Field H.Q. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算命令突击组回到总部阵地。在那里见面吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, looks like we're working together again, sir. General Chase assigned me to the Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，看来我们又要并肩作战了，长官。蔡斯将军把我编进突击组。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And thanks to your promotion, I guess I'll be saluting you from now on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还升官了嘛，我想从现在想我得向你敬礼了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, soldier. Everyone back home's rooting for you. Who knows, maybe your mug will end up on the front page of the Capital Post!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，士兵。在家乡的每一位同胞都支持你。说不定你的肖像会上《首都邮报》的头版呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, G.I. We're all counting on you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，大兵。我们全靠你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations on making it to the HQ. It's pretty fierce out there. Here's your chem ration. I'm doctor Adami. Come see me if you need patching up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你安全回到总部。外面战况很激烈啊。给你药品配给。我是奥达米医生。如果还需要包扎就回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : treating a patient in a hospital ward EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you're not dead. That's good. Hold still while I patch you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你还没死。很好。别动，我给你包扎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : treating a patient in a hospital ward EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back again? Well, I'm glad you came in on your own, and not in a body bag. Now be still while I fix you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又回来了？啊，很高兴你是自己走回来的的，而不是躺在尸体袋被运回来的。现在不要动，我来给你治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : treating a patient in a hospital ward EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get you up to 100% , shall we? Uncle Sam needs you back in the fight! Hold still a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们来治好你，好吗？山姆大叔需要你回到战斗中去！坚持一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : treating a patient in a hospital ward EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. Look, I've got to get back to HQ. I Found some papers before I got caught. Good hunting!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。听着，我得回到总部去。在我被抓之前我找到一些文件。祝你杀敌愉快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued.. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn Commies caught me with my pants down. Don't tell anyone you found me like this, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的中共在我睡觉的时候抓住了我。可别告诉别人你是这样找到我的，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: They took us by surprise. I was the lucky one. Thanks for the rescue!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们出奇不意地抓住了我们。我比较走运。感谢你们救了我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank God! I thought I was a goner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢上帝！我还以为我没命了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I glad to see you!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again! I'm out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢！我先离开这里了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really have time to stand here and chat? We've got work to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真有时间站在这聊天？我们还有工作要做呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Happy
NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Happy

ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么值得报告的，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : greeting a superior officer EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those Commies don't stand a chance, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些中共没机会赢，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : greeting a superior officer EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll crush the Commies soon, won't we, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很快就要消灭中共了，对吧，长官？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : greeting a superior officer EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : greeting a superior officer EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back for a loadout change?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember, that gear's property of Uncle Sam. Hope you didn't get it dinged up too badly...
ESP.TRADUIT: 记往，那件装备是山姆大叔的财产。希望你别弄坏了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust
NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not turning over anything to you until I have that Requisition Holo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你给我装备申请表，否则我不会给你任何东西的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to get a Requisition Holo before I can hand out gear -- you should know that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得出示装备申请表我才能发放装备 — 你应该知道的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, no Requisition Holo, no gear. This ain't a library.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，没有装备申请表就没有装备。这里不是图书馆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust
Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Carry on. I've got this in hand.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : a little testy, but respectful EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're here to help, then help. If not... back off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你来帮忙那就埋头帮忙。否则…就给我滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you didn't notice, I'm busy. Get lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没看到我在忙吗。走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find someone else to bother, local.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [000615C5] (ID) Quest : ([07000801]DLC02AnchorageCreatorQuest) 07000801 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should put that away. Before someone gets hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你应该放下那玩意。否则你会有麻烦的。

ESP.TRADUIT: 这里不能使用武器，该死的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got the shakes, sir? Why don't you sit down and take a break?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没事吧，长官？为何你不去坐下来休息一下？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do that, and it'll be the last move you ever make.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你敢那样做的话，那就是你活着做的最后一件事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : threatening EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus! Put that down! I'm a friendly!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : confused, his comrade is pointing a gun at him EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...the hell do you think you're doing?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...the hell do you think you're doing?

NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old games are no match for us Outcasts, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老把戏难不倒我们放逐者，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did us proud in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在那所做的让我们感到骄傲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 就本地人而言，你做得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never would have thought a savage could do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从没想过一个野蛮人可以做到这个地步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. Just what we need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太好了。这正是我们需要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic, annoyed. EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey... hey! Wake up. Come on... snap out of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂…喂！醒醒。打起精神来…振作一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The General is very anxious to speak with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将军正迫不及待的要跟你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lieutenant Thomas Morgan, Intelligence and Logistics at your service. I point, you shoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是托马斯·摩根中尉，负责情报和后勤，乐意为你效劳。我为你提供敌人的情报，而你去消灭他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next stop, Chinese H.Q. Keep it going!
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一站就是中国军队的总部。继续前进！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just got the confirmation that the Listening Post is ours. Now that's what I'm talking about!
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚刚得到证实，监听站已经被我们占领了。这才像话嘛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radar confirms that the Chinese Bombers are flying in circles now that we have the Listening Post. Nice one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷达证实中国轰炸机正在空中回旋，我们拿下了监听哨。干得好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boom! Scratch one Chimera Depot. Nice work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 砰！拿下了一个奇美拉维修站。干得漂亮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work on the Chimera fuel tanks. Half of their division is dead in the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇美拉维修站燃料罐那战打得好。敌人有将近半个师的兵力都淹死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rest of the Operation should make the Artillery Guns feel like a walk in the park.
ESP.TRADUIT: 剩下的行动应该能让炮兵部队自由发挥了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else that I&L can help with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么需要I&L帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : doctor to patient who wandered in EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell of a job you're doing soldier. America's watching. I'm making sure of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干得真他妈太棒了。我敢肯定整个美国都在看着呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : soldier saluting EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The U.S. Army needs more soldiers like you. Carry on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国陆军需要像你这样的士兵。加油。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's wrap this thing up, soldier. We're cold, we're tired and we want our goddamn oil back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来把这个包起来吧，士兵。我们现在饿寒交迫，一定要把我们该死的原油抢回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Chinese Communists are stomping all over us. Time for us to pay them back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的共军的铁蹄一直在我们周围践踏。是时候算总账了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's time to show those Red bastards what the U.S. Army is all about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是时候让那些杂种共军尝尝美军的厉害了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those targets can't secure themselves. You've got a job to do, soldier... now snap to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些目标很容易搞定。你有活干了，士兵…现在去干掉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're doing a man's job, soldier. Keep it up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你正在做一件男人的工作，士兵。坚持下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any word from Washington on my latest request?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我上一次向华盛顿的求援有回复了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's our boys in the suits doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的士兵们情况如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we looking at for losses if we pull this off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要取得胜利得付出多大的代价？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad you could join the party!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice to see a friendly faceplate.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Happy
Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't think I recognize your unit. Must be a new convert from old man Lyons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别以为我不知道你哪来的。肯定是刚从里昂斯老头那边投靠过来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're here to help, fine. Otherwise, out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是来帮忙的，那就好。否则给我滚开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't you be huddling in a cave somewhere?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是应该躲在某个洞里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，又来一个本地人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance, mutt. No knowing what you've got breeding on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我远点，混球。和你没什么好说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want to get your take on something...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey... Um... Ah, nevermind... It's nothing...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to talk to you... Two minutes of your time, that's all I'm asking...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得和你谈谈…只用两分钟就行，求你了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 话说回来…你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This waiting is killing me. I just want get out there, get it over with. How 'bout you -- doin' all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 坐在这干等真是烦死人了。我只想离开这里解决这一切。你呢 — 没什么问题吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, the adrenaline is giving me the shakes. How you holdin' up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝啊，肾上腺素正让我发抖呢。你怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can you be so relaxed? Before the day is out, we'll be fighting for our lives. You do realize that... right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么可以这么放松？过一会儿就要拼命了。你应该意识到了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at you, all calm, cool and collected. Doesn't the fact that we're surrounded by Chinese troops make you even a little bit anxious?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你，既沉着又冷静。我们被中国军队包围了，难道你一点都不紧张吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : greeting an officer EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember that your Strike Team members got families too you know. Let's send 'em home alive instead of in a pine box, got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 记着，你的突击组队员也有家人。我们要让他们自己走回家，而不是装进棺材被运回去，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stock up on ammo at the Quartermaster's tent. You're gonna need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去军需官那里要足够的弹药。你会需要它们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take out some of those Commies for Patterson and all the other guys we lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了帕特森和所有死去的同胞们，冲啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.TRADUIT: 红军死总好过你们死，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You watch yourself out there... the Chinese Army is one of the best fighting forces on Earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多加保重…中国军队是世界上最骁勇善战的军队之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust
NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Affirmative, sir. I'll inform them of your, ummm, displeasure at their progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵命，长官。我会向他们转告的…嗯…关于你对于进展的不满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely sir. I'll make sure they're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我会确保他们都准备充分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm sorry if I upset you. Okay? I'll just... get back to my duties now. No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么着，如果我惹着你了，那很抱歉。行么？我现在…要回去工作了。没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that was a waste of time...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay. I'm going. But I'm right. You know I'm right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。我走了。不过我没事。你知道我没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pfft. All right. I'll leave you alone, so you can pretend everything is fine. But you're kidding yourself, you know that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啐。好吧。我不打扰你了，你可以认为一切都很好。但这纯粹是自己哄自己，你心里有数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right. Forget I said anything.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, okay, I'm sorry. I was just... kidding...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，好吧，对不起。我只是…开个玩笑…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, now you're just babblin'. I'll talk to ya later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，不知道你在胡说些什么。再说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We live through this, and you're buying the beers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们靠这个谋生，而你只是玩票的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like talking to a child sometimes, you know that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时真像是对牛弹琴，你懂不懂？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里，在那里！消灭他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a present for ya, Commie!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty more where this came from!

ESP.TRADUIT: 星条旗永不落，你们这群杂种中共！

ESP.TRADUIT: 那差不多是你做出最明智的决定了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think long and hard before doing that again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再那么做的话，得想清楚点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of my country, Commie!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我的国家滚出去，中共！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a little something from Uncle Sam!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是山姆大叔给你们的小礼物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.TRADUIT: 就在那边，就在那边！干掉他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't let one of those Commies get away!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要放过任何一个中共！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wake up...Ole' Benji's got something for ya!
ESP.TRADUIT: 起来呀…看山姆大叔送礼物给你们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.TRADUIT: 继续啊，你们这群杂种红军！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna push you bastards right back to the Great Wall if I have to!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把你们这群杂种赶回长城另一边去！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your head will be mounted as a trophy, dog!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你的头挂起来当战利品，你这条狗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Jingwei [070018D2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut it, grunt. I'm not taking orders from anyone but McGraw. Now if you're done yapping, get inside and report for new orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，别吵了。除了麦格劳，我不会听从任何人的命令。如果你说完了，就进去报到接受新命令吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what you need to know. Don't push your luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你想知道的东西了。别想碰运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, this is the best I've got. You don't like it, go borrow from the Reds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我只有这个最好的了。不喜欢的话，就去从红军手里抢吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Target in proximity. Search pattern seven-three.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目标就在附近。搜索阵形7-3。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got us a ghost here. Eyes on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人潜伏在这里。注意点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will find you, American dog.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700BF9C]DLC02ChineseDialogue) Chinese Combat Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...This is Defender Morrill... Any Outcasts listening on this frequency, report to Sector 7-B, Bailey's Crossroads.
ESP.TRADUIT: …这是守卫莫里尔…听到这个频率的放逐者，请到贝利十字路口的7-B区报到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) NPC : Outcast Distress Signal [070013FD] (mod) Quest : ([070013FA]DLC02RadioOutcast) Outcast Distress Call EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 有人员伤亡，有人员伤亡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll make you pay for that!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger
Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

Quest : ([0700BF9C]DLC02ChineseDialogue) Chinese Combat Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉他们！把他们全干掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700BF9C]DLC02ChineseDialogue) Chinese Combat Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0700BF9C]DLC02ChineseDialogue) Chinese Combat Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any personnel listening on this frequency, please report at once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有谁听到这个频率的，请马上报到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) NPC : Outcast Distress Signal [070013FD] (mod) Quest : ([070013FA]DLC02RadioOutcast) Outcast Distress Call EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a high priority message, back-up is needed at our location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是紧急信息，我们这里需要支援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) NPC : Outcast Distress Signal [070013FD] (mod) Quest : ([070013FA]DLC02RadioOutcast) Outcast Distress Call EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe later. I just remembered I have somewhere else to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许晚些吧。我只记得我该去哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, local. I'm trying to be reasonable with you. Don't make me reconsider that decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，本地人。我在和你讲道理。别逼我改变主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Sibley will take you to the simulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。西布利会带你去模拟器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can it, soldier! Who's in charge of this mess? I want his head on a platter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在干什么，士兵！谁负责这里的，这里看上去一团糟！我想把他脑袋放在盘子里！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, that'd be Protector McGraw... Sir. He's... he's inside. Go ahead in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，去找护卫麦格劳…先生。他…他在里面。进去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, that'd be Protector McGraw... Ma'am. He's... he's inside. Go ahead in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，去找护卫麦格劳…女士。他…他在里面。进去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, the rest of the guys should be here any second now. <Lie>
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，其余的家伙应该会火速赶到这儿。<撒谎>

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, we'll probably need their help. Mutants'll be back before long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们可能需要他们的帮助。变种人很快就会回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get inside and check in with Protector McGraw. He's running the operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进去和护卫麦格劳谈谈。他负责这个行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not one of your soldiers. I just like wearing your armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是你的士兵。我只是喜欢穿你们的装甲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Just who the hell are you, some local? You got a death wish, walking around in our...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你他妈是谁啊，什么本地人？你活得不耐烦了，胆敢在我们这里闲逛…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a second... that computer on your wrist. You're from a damned Vault?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下…你手腕上戴着一个小电脑。你是从该死的避难所里出来的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Artillery Site? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 炮兵基地？你在说些什么啊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly are we up against here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在这里要对付的是什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Artillery Site? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 炮兵基地？你在说些什么啊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. Let's lock and load.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，大干一场吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I have no idea where we are or what's going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我根本不知道我们现在的位置，也不知道发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, the... fall threw me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，这个…瀑布把我丢下来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, alright. Just give me a second to clear my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给我一点时间来整理一下思路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm fine, don't worry about it. So, what's the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好，不用担心。我们的计划是什么？
等等…怎么回事？这里到底发生了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yeah. See if you can keep up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，看你能不能坚持下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No sweat. You're on point, rookie.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hang on a second. Do you have any spare ammo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 稍等一下，你有没有多余的弹药给我一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I can spare a few rounds.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'm supposed to kill the Chinese with what? Snowballs? Sorry, that's all I can give ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我用什么东西杀中共？雪球？对不起，我只能给你那么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not enough ammo. You got any more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这点弹药不够，你有多余的吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What took you so damn long?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么花了这么长时间？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah. Don't break your arm patting yourself on the back, rookie. You took the easy way in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，嗯。别沾沾自喜了，菜鸟。你来那条路容易得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's the situation? We clear to blow the hell out of this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，情况如何？我们可以炸平这地方了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's cut the chatter... we've got some guns to destroy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废话少说…我们得赶紧摧毁大炮。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's the situation? We clear to blow the hell out of this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，情况如何？我们可以炸平这地方了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to see you made it in one piece.
Yeah, I almost bought it out on the cliffs. Didn't know the Reds were so handy with a Sniper Rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我在悬崖上差点挂了。没料到红军的狙击枪使得这么好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's the situation? We clear to blow the hell out of this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，情况如何？我们可以炸平这地方了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure I'm ready, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我还没准备好，长官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you'd better be, soldier. We're running short on time and that was NOT an offer, that was an order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好快做准备，士兵。时间不够了，而且这由不得你，这是命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have three hardened targets we need your team to handle otherwise Operation Anchorage will be dead in the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要你的小队去消灭3个顽固的目标，否则安克雷奇行动将会失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow me over to the situation map and I'll bring you up to speed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，看看当前的局势图，我会详细讲解的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 给我的命令是什么，长官？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are three hardened targets that stand between us and the Chinese Headquarters. That's where your Strike Team comes in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们与中国军队总部之间有3个顽固的目标。这就是你的突击组的任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow me over to the situation map and I'll bring you up to speed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，看看当前的局势图，我会详细讲解的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soldier, you're fixing to have a size 10 combat boot shoved up your candy ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵，你的大屁股真是欠踢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your attitude's just earned you a demerit. I don't want to hear that kind of talk out of you again. Is that crystal clear enough now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚才的态度显示了你的低素质。我不想再听到你那样说话。听明白了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all a bit strung out from the last Commie bombing run on our Field H.Q.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中共上次轰炸我们的战地指挥部后，我们还没喘过气来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lost some good men including my Strike Team Commander, Colonel Patterson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们损失了一些优秀的士兵，包括我的突击组指挥官帕特森上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官，我完全理解了，长官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: At ease, soldier. We're all a bit strung out from the last Commie bombing run on our Field H.Q.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稍息，士兵。中共上次轰炸我们的战地指挥部后，我们还没喘过气来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lost some good men including my Strike Team Commander, Colonel Patterson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们损失了一些优秀的士兵，包括我的突击组指挥官帕特森上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: They knew the drill when they signed up, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们入伍时就做好准备了，长官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Commie sons-of-bitches. It'll be a cold day in hell before I let them cross Canada into the mainland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗娘养的中共。他们想跨过加拿大进入美国本土，得先过我这一关才行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But enough of that. I called you down here for a reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不说这个了。我叫你来这儿是有原因的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've earned yourself a field promotion, soldier. From this moment on, you're in charge of Patterson's Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你赢得了一次火线晋升，士兵。从此刻起，你就是帕特森突击组的队长了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Red bastards... can't wait to push them all the way back to Beijing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的杂种红军…我等不及要把他们赶回北京去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I didn't call you down here for a pep talk and cigars. You've earned yourself a field promotion, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫你来不是给你鼓气或者让你抽烟的。你赢得了一次火线晋升，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: From this moment on, you're in charge of Patterson's Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从此刻起，你就是帕特森突击组的队长了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I can do to assist, sir?
I didn't call you down here for a pep talk and cigars. You've earned yourself a field promotion, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫你来不是给你鼓气或者让你抽烟的。你赢得了一次火线晋升，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As of this moment you're taking over Patterson's Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从此刻起，你就是帕特森突击组的队长了。
