ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: And before you thank me, you better wait and see what your mission entails.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好先等等，看完任务详情再来谢我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah... make with the next objective so I can finish the simulation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，是啊…快进行下一步吧，好让我能完成模拟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is no simulation, soldier! That's real blood you see out there on the snow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是模拟，士兵！你在雪地上看到的可是真正的鲜血！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got enough to worry about without some hotshot like you breaking protocol. Now get it together... you have a job to do. Am I clear, soldier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经够烦的了，而你这蠢货还在破坏规矩。打起精神来…你有活干了。明白了吗，士兵？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We sure sent those Red Chinese packing!
Now hold on there, soldier. You see these fancy little gold stars on my uniform?
ESP.TRADUIT: 打住，士兵。你看到我制服上这些精致的金色五角星了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent a lot of time getting them, and I'll be damned if some punk like you isn't going to address me properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我花了很久才赢得它们，如果有像你这样的废物连跟我讲话都态度不端，我会很生气的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I appreciate your enthusiasm in this operation, there's still protocol to be maintained. Are we clear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我欣赏你在本次行动中的激情，但规矩还是要遵守的。听明白了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to thank me. I know a genuine true-blooded soldier when I see one... and that's why I sent you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用谢我。如果有哪个士兵是个真正的热血青年，我一眼就能看出来…那正是我派你去的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately while you were up there climbing mountains, we were down here getting our butts kicked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，当你在上面爬山的时候，我们在下面被打得屁滚尿流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chinese decided to use our Field H.Q. for target practice and damn near blew us all to pieces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队将我们的战地指挥部作为练习目标，差点把我们都轰成碎片了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lost some good men including my Strike Team Commander, Colonel Patterson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们损失了一些优秀的士兵，包括我的突击组指挥官帕特森上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately while you were up there climbing mountains, we were down here getting our butts kicked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，当你在上面爬山的时候，我们在下面被打得屁滚尿流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chinese decided to use our Field H.Q. for target practice and damn near blew us all to pieces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队将我们的战地指挥部作为练习目标，差点把我们都轰成碎片了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lost some good men including my Strike Team Commander, Colonel Patterson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们损失了一些优秀的士兵，包括我的突击组指挥官帕特森上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some more information about my objectives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些关于我的任务的更多信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, what did you need to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你想知道什么事情？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to discuss my Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要讨论一下我的突击组。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, that's what I'm here for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这正是我在此的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I didn't sign up for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我不是受雇来干这个的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of us did. We all just end up doing what we're supposed to do and hopefully make the enemy die in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都不是。我但我们终究还是要做该做的事，以期望能干掉敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'm here to give you a hand with Intelligence and Logistics. Whatever you need, I'm your guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我是来帮你负责情报和后勤的。有需要的话找我就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suicide Squad? Why do they call it that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自杀小队？他们为什么这么称呼自己？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I really have to answer that? You aren't going after civilian targets you know... this is the big leagues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的要回答那个问题吗？你要知道，你攻击的可不是平民目标…这是场硬仗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'm here to give you a hand with Intelligence and Logistics. Whatever you need, I'm your guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我是来帮你负责情报和后勤的。有需要的话找我就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, all I got to keep me warm out here in this freezebox is my sense of humor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，唯一能让我在这寒冷的鬼地方里取暖的只有我的幽默感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'm here to give you a hand with Intelligence and Logistics. Whatever you need, I'm your guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我是来帮你负责情报和后勤的。有需要的话找我就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not looking for trouble. I'm just here because of the radio signal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来找麻烦的，我是因为电台信号才在这儿的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You heard our signal? How'd you manage that? It's not broadcast on a standard frequency...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你收听到我们的信号？怎么做到的？我们又没有在标准频率上广播…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...oh, I see. You've got one of those wrist-mounted computers. Well, well. Isn't that interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: …哦，我明白了。你有那种戴在手腕上的电脑。好啦，好啦。很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell did you hear my signal? It's not broadcast on a standard frequency...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么收听到我的信号的？我们又没有在标准频率上广播…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...oh, I see. You've got one of those wrist-mounted computers. Well, well. Isn't that interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: …哦，我明白了。你有那种戴在手腕上的电脑。好啦，好啦。很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard your radio signal, and thought I'd come and lend a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到了你们的电台信号，觉得我该来帮下忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I had to kill a few of your guys to get a suit that looked good on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我非得杀掉一些你的人来弄一件衣服，这衣服我穿上看起来很不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You filthy fucking wastelander... You're dead, you hear me? Dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这肮脏的垃圾废土游民…你死定了，听见了没有？死定了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you some kind of idiot? Listen, little girl... hey, wait a second. What's that on your wrist there? Some kind of computer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是白痴吗？听着，小姑娘…喂，你手腕上那个是什么？是不是某种电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just looking for my dad.
Are you some kind of idiot? Listen, kid... hey, wait a second. What's that on your wrist there? Some kind of computer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是白痴吗？听着，小伙子…喂，你手腕上那个是什么？是不是某种电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just looking for my dad.
I suggest you turn right around before you find yourself full of holes. We've taken over this sector, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议你在被打成马蜂窝之前立即向后转。这里是我们的地盘，还有…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hang on. Is that some kind of computer on your wrist?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下。你手腕上那个是某种电脑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just stopped in to ransack the place. Didn't expect to find anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是顺便打一下劫。没想到会找到什么人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, this armor? I found it. Honest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，这装甲？我找到的它。老实说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh. Well, now that you've been nice enough to return it to us...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵。你人还不错啊，居然能把它还给我们…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...hey, what's that on your wrist? That's some kind of computer, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: …喂，你手腕上那个是什么？是不是某种电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, isn't that nice of you. Looks like things have calmed down now, so why don't you just run along...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你真是太好了。看起来事情平息了，你为什么不离开呢…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...hey, what's that on your wrist? That's some kind of computer, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: …喂，你手腕上那个是什么？是不是某种电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I just wandered in here, and it looked like you guys needed help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我只是在这儿闲逛，看上去你的兄弟需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morrill calling in... Yeah, we took care of 'em. Listen, I'm sending down a local. You'll want to talk to this one. Yeah, exactly. Morrill out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是莫里尔…嗯，我们搞定了。听着，我派一个本地人过去。你会想和这一位谈谈的。嗯，你会的。莫里尔通话完毕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the latest on the Pulse Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我脉冲场的最新情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The problem out there isn't the Field itself... I mean, you wouldn't be foolish enough to drag robots out there with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里的问题不是战场本身…我的意思是，你不会笨到带着机器人一起上战场吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The place is crawling with their stealth units... the Crimson Dragoons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里遍布他们的隐形部队…“赤龙骑兵”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you spot something out of the corner of your eye, shoot first and ask questions later or it's the last thing you'll ever see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你眼角余光看到有东西，先开枪再说，否则你就死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the latest on the Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我监听站的最新情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, this place is a honey pot, lemme tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那可是个带劲的地方，我告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcasm EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not only is it swarming with regular ground troops, but they've put their best guys in there as well, the Crimson Dragoons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不仅充斥着常规地面部队，还有他们的菁英部队—赤龙骑兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcasm EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear those guys start training as soldiers right from the womb, so watch yourself in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说那些人打从胚胎起就开始被训练成战士。所以你要小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcasm EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the latest on the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我奇美拉维修站的最新情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got two fuel tanks to destroy. One in the central courtyard of the facility and one near the rear gate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去摧毁两个燃料罐。一个在设施的中央庭院，另一个在后门附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is one tough nut to crack. Not only do you have the Chimeras to contend with, but the place is heavily populated by infantry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要拿下那地方很棘手。不仅要对付奇美拉坦克，还要对付大批步兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for your latest intel reports.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道你所掌握的最新情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's my specialty. What target did you need a report on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我的专长。你想知道哪个目标的详情？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some new gear. Can you set me up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要些新的装备。 你能帮助我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, that's all Uncle Sam is going to issue ya. Maybe you could find some more stuff out there in the field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，山姆大叔只能给你这么多了。也许你可以在战场上找到更多的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can do. Just use the Requisition Terminal here in the Command Tent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以。使用司令部帐篷里的装备申请终端就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : semi-sarcastic EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pick whatever loadout you need and the terminal will dispense a Requisition Tape. Bring it to the Quartermaster Officer and you're all set.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便挑你需要的装备，电脑会给出一份申请表。带着它去找军需官就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : semi-sarcastic EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The government sure loves its paperwork, doesn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 政府就是爱搞书面活儿，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : semi-sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I lose a Strike Team member?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我的突击组队员死了怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can always speak to your Strike Team squad leader and requisition a new unit if you've lost one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你损失了一个部下，可以随时和你的突击组队长说话，申请一位新的队员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't I just take a whole bunch of guys with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能带上一大帮人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way. The bigger your Strike Team, the bigger your footprint on all of the Chinese sensing devices. You need to think small.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行。突击组规模越大，就越容易被中国军队的仪器探测到行踪。你得往小处想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Recruitment Markers I gave you will recommend what size you keep your team in order to maintain the smallest footprint possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你的征兵许可会对你的小组如何保持适当的规模来降低被发现的可能性提出建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So to put it simply, you pick a big clunky robot, and you won't have much room left in the team for many other units. You decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单地说吧，你挑了一个又大又笨重的机器人，队里就没有太多位置留给其他队员了。你自己选吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I put together my Strike Team?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该怎么组织突击组？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncle Sam's made it really easy for you. All you have to do is use Patterson's Terminal here in the Command Tent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆大叔为你考虑周详。你要做的只是使用司令部帐篷里的帕特森的终端。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the Recruitment Markers I gave you and choose your team members any way you see fit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用我给你的征兵许可，挑选你满意的小队成员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then head outside to the Barracks and your units will be ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后到外面的兵营去，你的部队就会准备好出发了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me ask you about another target.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yup. If you take down the Pulse Field, we'll send the T-51b shock troops in to blast through their defenses, and then it's on to the Headquarters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。如果你除掉脉冲场，我们就会派出T-51b突击部队突破他们的防线，接着进攻他们的总部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How am I going to destroy the Pulse Field?
There's a bunker the Chinese have set up to monitor the area somewhere beyond the emitters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队在发射器那一边某处建了一个地堡来监视这一地区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: An operator in the bunker can deactivate the field to allow their own guys to pass through unharmed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地堡里的操作员可以关掉脉冲场，以使友军安全通过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can get to the bunker, you could set the field to overload and blow it out permanently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能到达地堡，就能使脉冲场过载，永远地摧毁它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does the Pulse Field do?
Well, it generates a grid-based, localized electromagnetic pulse. Anything mechanical that goes through there gets all its circuits fried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它产生一种基于电网的局部电磁脉冲。任何机械物体穿过就会烧坏所有电路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing that can punch through their defenses there are the T-51b's, so you can see the problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一能突破他们防线的只有T-51b部队，所以你了解问题所在了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the urgency in securing this facility?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要如此紧迫地肃清该设施？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well the Chinese Army not only uses the Listening Post to spot our forces and relay battle information, they also use it for air traffic control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队不仅使用监听站来监听我军、转达战场情报，还用它来为空军导航。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we can get a hold of that facility, we can stop them from bombing the living hell out of us any chance they get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能拿下那个设施，我们就能阻止他们继续轰炸这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I expect to find inside the post?
The Chinese have a team of commandos they call their Crimson Dragoons. They're pretty much the best soldiers they've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队里有一队特种部队，被称为“赤龙骑兵”，是他们军中最强的战士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Listening Post is filled with those units. I'd be extra careful in there if I were you -- they aren't about to give that place up lightly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个监听站里全是那种部队。如果我是你，我会格外小心 — 他们可不会轻易就范。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How exactly do I "secure" the Listening Post?
ESP.TRADUIT: 确切来说，如何才算“肃清”监听站？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basically, you need to clear it of all personnel and make it safe for occupation by our troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本上，你必须剿清所有敌方人员，保证我们的部队安全占领。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a little bit of a rat hunt though, since you'll have to poke around inside the facility and root them out one-by-one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过会有点像抓老鼠，你得在设施里四处搜寻，将他们逐个铲除。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the point of taking out the Chimera Depot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁奇美拉维修站有什么用？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't know about you, but if I was running across the main battlefield I'd like a few less of those monstrosities shooting at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你怎么认为，但如果我在战场上的话，可不想被那些怪物开炮打到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take out the Depot and they have nowhere to rearm and refuel their armor. Otherwise, they'll blast your team to bits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁兵站，他们就无处补给弹药和燃料。否则，他们会把你的小组撕成碎片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I take out the Fuel Tanks?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要怎么摧毁这些燃料罐？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the Explosive Charges I gave you and locate both of the fuel tanks. Just stick 'em on and boom. Couldn't be easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带上我给你的炸药，找到那两个燃料罐。只要把它们贴上去就可以引爆。再简单不过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't stand too close to admire your handiwork, though. The fireball will likely take your head off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是我，就不会站得太近来欣赏你的手艺。火球会把你的头轰掉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.TRADUIT: 奇美拉坦克究竟是什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put simply, it's a co-opted mining rig that's been changed into an armored vehicle -- bigger and tougher than any tank we have in our arsenal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单的说，它是从原用于采矿的设备改装而来的武装军用车 — 比我们兵工厂里的任何一种坦克更大更坚固。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chinese fitted the vehicle with multiple weapons, reinforced the armor and outfitted them for long range.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队在车上装了多种武器，增强了装甲，加大了作战范围。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you need to know?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who cares about my Pip-Boy? I'm here to find out what's going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁还在乎我的哔哔小子啊？我在这儿是为了查明发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay. I'm sure Protector McGraw will be happy to tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好。我敢肯定护卫麦格劳会很高兴与你说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you go on inside? I'll let him know you're coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不进去？我会告诉他你来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's mine, and before you ask, no you can't have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这是我的，而且在你问之前我就可以告诉你，不，我不会给你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slow down there, kid. I'm not asking for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先别忙，孩子。我没要求你那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think, though, that you wanna talk to Protector McGraw. Head on inside; I'll let him know you're coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想你要和护卫麦格劳谈谈。进去；我会告诉他你来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This? It's my Pip-Boy 3000. Want to see?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的哔哔小子3000。想看一下？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't that fancy. Listen kid, maybe you could help us out. We've been looking for someone like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太奇怪了。听着，孩子，也许你能帮助我们。我们一直在找像你这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you head inside and talk to Protector McGraw? I'll radio ahead and let him know you're coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为何不进去和护卫麦格劳谈谈？我会通知他你来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed your buddies at Fort Independence. Now it's your turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了你在独立堡的兄弟们。现在轮到你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You arrogant little shit. Outcasssttssss! We've got a hostile!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这自大的小混蛋。放逐者！这里有敌人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've dealt with your group before. Fort Independence, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我之前已经处理了你的小组。独立堡，是不？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, that is our main base of operations in the area. If Casdin is willing to trust you, then I hope we can work together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，那就是我们在本区行动的主基地。如果卡斯丁能够信任你，那我希望我们可以一起工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be happy to help, provided there's something in it for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会很乐意帮忙，前提是我能得到些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not wrong. So for now I'll overlook the fact that you've got some of our tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的。到目前为止我才注意到你拥有我们某些科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can assist us, it'll be worth your while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你肯帮助我们，我们会报答你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guilty as charged. But it looks like you need help just the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪如其判。但看上去你同样需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF you can help, then I suspect it will definitely be worth your time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你肯帮忙，我们一定会报答你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, who wouldn't want to help out the surly guys in scary armor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，谁不乐意帮助那些穿着吓人装甲的粗暴家伙们解决问题呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That device on your wrist. That's not our tech. That, and the fact that none of us would be stupid enough to take our armor off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手腕上戴的那个设备。那不是我们的科技产物。我们还不会笨到把我们的护甲脱下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the part where I'd have you killed. At least, under normal circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里我本可以杀了你的。至少在一般的情况下会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, it turns out you might be useful to us. If you can help, I'll forget that you should be dead for wearing that armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但，看来你可能对我们有用。如果你肯帮忙，我可以原谅你胆敢穿着那护甲的死罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That device on your wrist. That's not our tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手腕上戴的那个设备。那不是我们的科技产物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the part where I'd have you killed. At least, under normal circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里我本可以杀了你的。至少在一般的情况下会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, it turns out you might be useful to us. If you can help, I'll forget that you should be dead for wearing that armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但，看来你可能对我们有用。如果你肯帮忙，我可以原谅你穿着那护甲的死罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine. I get it. I'm not trying to intimidate you here. I just need your help, and we can both come out of this better off than we are now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。我懂了。我不会胁迫你的。我只是需要你的帮助，有事好商量嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That computer on your wrist there. I need that, and I need you to use it. Okay? That's it. No one's going to hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手腕上那个电脑。我需要它，而且我需要你来使用它。好吗？就这样。没人会伤害你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope we're talking "helpful" useful, and not "tasty" useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我们的谈话有助益的价值，不是有好吃的价值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not an idiot. That computer you've got on your wrist there? That's not our tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是白痴。你手腕上戴的那个电脑？那不是我们的科技产物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how about you tell me what you're really doing here before I have you killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我叫人杀了你之前，告诉我你到底来这里做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No, of course I'm one of you... uhh, sir. <Lie>
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，我当然是你们中的一员……呃，长官。<撒谎>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do we look like cannibals? Are you really that dense?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们看起来像是食人者吗？你不会这么笨吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That computer on your wrist is what I'm talking about. I need that computer -- and the person attached to it -- to access the technology here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的是你手腕上戴的那个电脑。我需要那个电脑 — 还有戴着它的人 — 来访问这里的科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must have something you want, so let's cut to the chase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这儿肯定有些你需要的，那我们就开门见山吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, all right. You're obviously sharper than the average rubble dweller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵，好吧。很明显，你看起来要比那些一般的平民要聪明得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That computer you've got on your wrist is a specialized piece of equipment. I need someone who knows how to use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手腕上那个电脑是种专门的设备。我需要懂得使用它的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can be that someone, I'm willing to work with you to make your life easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你肯帮忙，我很乐意和你一起工作，让你的人生更美好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, my Pip-Boy makes me unique, and you need my help because of that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我的哔哔小子使我很特别，为此你需要我的帮助……

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you do have half a brain. That's good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么看来你还有点脑子。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep it simple. I need you, and I need that computer of yours. You help me out, and I'll do what I can to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我长话短说。我需要你，还需要你那个电脑。你帮助我，我就会尽我所能帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't an offer the Outcasts extend to anyone, so you really should think carefully about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般情况下放逐者不会提供这样的机会，所以你要好好考虑一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to kill you SO MUCH.
I'll see your blood on my blade before today is done!
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天，我就要让你血溅当场！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Jingwei [070018D2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's over, Jingwei. Surrender and lay down your arms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了，精卫。 投降并放下你的武器。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Jingwei [070018D2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've already lost, General. Don't throw away your dignity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经输了，将军。 别再丢掉尊严。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will never take me prisoner!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Jingwei [070018D2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I should just be going.
You realize I could force you to stay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我可以强迫你留下吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to do that. I hope you take that gesture as it's intended -- to show that I really do want your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会那么做的。我希望你认为那个手势是有意的 — 表示我确实需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what do you want me to do?
Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有记录显示，在这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's VR simulation program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, we don't have one. You do, right there on your wrist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我们没有这样的人。而你有，就在你手腕上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. You'll get a share of the gear, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。当然，你可以分一份装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想和你再说下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do us both a favor and walk away, and forget this conversation ever took place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行行好，走开吧，当我们从没讲过话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get away from me, moron. And pray I don't report you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开，蠢货。还有，祈祷我不会告发你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh! No more. Just... no more.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still here? Cause some of us have orders to follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在这里？那是因为我们有些人收到命令要跟着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Treason. That's the word, soldier. Think about it while you're getting the hell away from me. Now shoo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是叛国。听清楚了吗，士兵。当你离开我的时候好好想一下。现在给我滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough! Okay? You go down, I ain't letting you drag me down with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！好吧？你自己下去，我才不跟你一起去呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back off, troop, or I WILL report your sorry ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退后，士兵们，否则我会让你们吃不了兜着走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, I know... It's just...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, get off your high horse! You see what's happening around here. We've been falling apart since we left the Citadel. I'm sick of it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，收起你的傲慢吧！你看到这里发生什么事了。自从我们离开大本营就四分五裂了。我受不了了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you know I'm right! I overheard what you said yesterday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是的，你知道我是对的！昨天我无意中听到你说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. But I just thought... You know...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢. 我只是以为…你知道的…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, wait! What I MEANT to say, was that, um...
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，等一下！我想说的是…嗯…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, like you're the model of well adjustment. I see the way you eye McGraw. You'd cut and run if the opportunity presented itself. Admit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，好像你是楷模似的。我看过你盯着麦格劳的眼神。一有机会你就会溜之大吉的。承认吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you'd understand. You of all people. I guess I was wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你会明白的。你们所有人都会明白。现在看来我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You cannot be serious. Just... stop talking. You're going to get us both killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你是在开玩笑吧。别…别再说了。你会害死我们俩的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you lost your mind? If the Protector hears you talking like that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了吗？如果护卫听到你这么说…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Troop, you are having a serious malfunction... Would you listen to yourself? That's treason!
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵们，你们犯了严重的错误…你会听从自己吗？那是叛国！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? What are you TALKING about? Look, would you just... just get back to your assignment. I'm not listening to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？你在说什么？你可不可以…回到你的岗位上去？我不想再听这个了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know where this is coming from soldier, but I've heard enough. Button it, or I'll report you myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这是哪里来的，士兵，但我听够了。别再说了，否则我就去举报你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! No, no, no no. You want to talk crazy, do it someplace else. I'm keeping my mouth shut and following orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！不不不不。你要胡说八道的话就找错地方了。我不和你废话，按照命令办事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, not again! You've got to shake this stuff off. Get your head clear. You're an Outcast, now, just like the rest of us. Deal with it already. Okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，又来了！你必须扔掉这玩意。清醒一点。现在你是一个放逐者，像我们一样。搞定它。明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you get the feeling that this is all just a waste of time? I mean, how do we REALLY know that simulation gives access to the tech?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不认为这是在浪费时间吗？我是说，我们怎么会知道通过那模拟程序可以找到那个科技？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just... I don't know, I feel kind of bad about that Gary guy. Not his fault the Pip-Boy didn't work. Did we really need to... you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是…我不知道，我对那个加里有不祥的感觉。PP小子没用并不是他的错。我们是不是真的要…你知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we've been dropping like Bloatflies lately. How long can we keep those Frankensteins at bay? One more focused attack, and we're all dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，不久前我们就像辐射蝇一样被丢下了。我们还能挡住那些怪物多久？再受一次强烈袭击，我们都会上西天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... If Casdin were in charge, we would have had the tech and been back at Fort Independence yesterday. Protector McGraw is in over his head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要…如果卡斯丁还是主管，我们昨天就能取得科技并回到独立堡了。但是现在是护卫麦格劳说了算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever wonder what they're doing? You know, back at the Citadel? I mean, sure, Lyons went off-mission... but it wasn't a bad life, was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有想过他们在做什么吗？你知道的，他们在五角大本营里做什么？我是说，当然，里昂斯放弃了任务…但那也不错，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is such a wild goose chase. Lost tech? Please. Only thing we're going to find in this tomb is canned peaches and moldy blankets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是大海捞针。战前科技？拜托。在这个墓地里能找到的只有水果罐头和发霉的毯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's say we DO find some really high-grade tech. Seems to me, a group of enterprising grunts could strike off on their own. Go... independent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，我们的确找到一些相当高级的科技。在我看来，一个可以让集团自力更生的可能。争取…独立。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just hear me out. I've been thinking… imagine what a group like Talon Company could do with the two of us. Huh? You and me, goin' merc...
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我说。我一直在想，像鹰爪公司这样的企业会不会需要我们两个？嗯？你和我，去做佣兵...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well. I, um... Listen, when all this is over, I... I think I might go back. Not to the Citadel! I mean, all the way back. You know, back west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。我，嗯…听着，当这一切结束后，我…我想我会回去。不是去大本营！我的意思是，一直回去。你知道的，回到西岸去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got somethin' to say, say it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, I don't have all day. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点，我没这么多时间。怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not sitting in that thing unless you're wearing the suit for it. I'm not going to have you fry the circuits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你穿着制服，否则你不能坐在那上面。我可不想你烧掉电路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, that's all we're allowed to distribute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我们只能配给这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have a complaint, make sure you lodge it in writing using the standard 10-78BGHCF Form.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有意见，得用标准的10-78BGHCF表格书面提出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah sure. Just get me a new Requisition Form.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当然。给你一份新的申请表。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can only change your gear once, though. We've got limited weapons out here in the sticks. Anything else you'll have to scavenge from the field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你只能更换一次你的装备。我们这里武器有限。要其他东西的话得去战场上捡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help yourself. Anything you need should be in the ammo crates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请自便。你要的东西都在弹药箱里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to change to Heavy Weapons gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成重装强袭装备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来保管你所有的旧装备，给你新的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything appears to be in order. Here you go.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for my Heavy Weapons gear. Here's my Requisition Holotape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成重装强袭装备了。这是我的装备申请表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to change to Sniper gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成远程狙击装备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来保管你所有的旧装备，给你新的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything appears to be in order. Here you go.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for my Sniper gear. Here's my Requisition Holotape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成远程狙击装备了。这是我的装备申请表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to change to Close Assault gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成近距突击装备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来保管你所有的旧装备，给你新的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything appears to be in order. Here you go.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for my Close Assault gear. Here's my Requisition Holotape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成近距突击装备了。这是我的装备申请表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to change to Fire Team gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成火力支援装备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来保管你所有的旧装备，给你新的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything appears to be in order. Here you go.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for my Fire Team gear. Here's my Requisition Holotape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成火力支援装备了。这是我的装备申请表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: First let's talk about what I get out of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先让我们谈谈我能从中得到什么好处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wasters, always thinking of yourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这种废土人，总是想着自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, look. I'm in a bind here. I need results from this expedition, and I need them now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，是这样的，我现在陷入困境了。我需要这次远征的报告，现在就要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can help us out, you get a cut of whatever we find locked up in here. You're not going to get a better deal from me than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能帮助我们，无论我们在这里找到什么东西，都会分一份给你。没有比这更好的报酬了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no time for chit chat, Sergeant.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have no idea how many lives you saved by destroying those guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你摧毁了那些大炮，拯救的生命不计其数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, saluting is the least I can do. Do you have any idea how many of our guys you saved by taking out those guns?
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他呢，我最起码也该向你敬礼。你知道你摧毁那些大炮，拯救了多少人的性命吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have the Strike Team hold up right here.
Well, now, remember... We got a lot of damn Chinese to kill. Millions of 'em. You're gonna have to step up your game. Do some real soldierin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，现在，记住…我们要去杀大把中国人，杀他个几百万人。你们的动作要快，拿出当兵的气势来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't died yet, have I? In fact, I'm startin' to think I'm indestructible. Like some kind of superhero. You can call me... "Supergrunt."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没死，对吧？事实上，我开始认为我是刀枪不入的。就像某种超级英雄一样。你可以称呼我…“超兽人”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soldier, you just stick with me. We'll be the most highly decorated soldiers in the Army when this thing is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵，你跟着我就行。任务完成之后我们将会被授予军中最高的荣誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'll do whatever it takes. You know why? If I don't protect the weak -- you know, people like you -- who will?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂，无论如何我都会做的。知道为什么吗？如果我不保护那些弱者 -- 就像你这样的人 -- 谁会来保护他们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I do have a sort of "secondary objective" I need to get done. My kid brother back home wants one of them Chinese guns. Things could get ugly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我确实有项“次要任务”需要完成。我在家乡的小兄弟想要一把中国军队的枪。有点难度吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, don't you go actin' the hero on me, all right? You'll hog all the medals, like last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂，你可别给我逞英雄啊，知道吗？你会得到大把勋章的，就像上次那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well, you just remember you're not a one-man army, and you may live long enough to enjoy the victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，好，你只要记住军队不止你一个人，就可以活着享受胜利了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's right. You signed up for this crap. Sometimes I forget you actually like killing people. Maybe we can just send you in by yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是啊。你主动请缨啊。有时我都忘了你喜欢杀人了。也许我们可以只派你一个人上前线就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spoken like a true defender of freedom. Just don't go doin' anything stupid out there, okay? Remember, I'll be standing next to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿出个真正的“自由捍卫者”的样子来。在那边不要做什么傻事，好吗？记住，我会在你身边的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to get in there, kill a couple Reds for good measure, and then get my ass back to base camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想上战场，尽量多杀几个红军，然后安全回到营地来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need is a weapon at my front and you sons o' bitches at my back. I'm ready to get this thing done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要身前有支枪、身后跟着你们这群杂种就行了。我已经准备好战斗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to kill me some Commies, I can tell you that much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经做好准备杀中共了，只能告诉你这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ever tell you I got an aunt lives in Anchorage? She's in there... somewhere. And God help me, I'm gonna get those Reds out of her backyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有告诉过你我有个姑姑住在安克雷奇吗？她在那里的…某个地方吧。上帝保佑，让我把红军赶出她的家园。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, Anchorage ain't nothin'. You know what all this is? Practice. Next stop, Shanghai. Just you wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，安克雷奇可有重大意义啊。你懂不懂？这是演习。下一站就是上海了。等着瞧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know me. My day ain't complete unless I've killed me some Reds. So let's start the killin' already...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你了解我的。不杀几个红军我是不罢休的。让我们来大开杀戒吧…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm feelin' that "twitch" in my eyebrow. You, know, that one I get when there are Commies around. Gonna be a fun day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的眼皮有点“跳”。刚才一群共匪涌过来，我放倒了一个呢。今天会很好玩的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What good's having a weapon if they won't let me use it? Pal, I am ready to flick the safety off and engage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 连武器都不让我用的话，我能干什么？伙计，我已经打开保险准备战斗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just watch yourself. The Reds up here don't take prisoners. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定要小心。红军是不会留活口的。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll still meet at the rendezvous point inside as planned then we'll blow those artillery guns to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们按原计划在里面的预定地点见面，然后我们会炸飞那些火炮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still have your gear, so I'm gonna let you make the call. You can go in quiet or guns blazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你装备还在，所以我会让你选择，是悄悄地潜入，还是大张旗鼓地打进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think their patrols spotted us coming in, so at least we still have the jump on 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他们的巡逻队没看到我们来了，所以我们还有机会偷袭他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was a hell of a nasty fall you took. When your chute bunched up like that I thought you were a goner. I hope the other guys made it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你落地的动作可真恐怖啊。你的降落伞裹成一团时，我还以为你完蛋了。希望其他人安然无恙…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, sorry. I'm just trying to figure out what's going on here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，对不起。我只是想知道这儿现在什么状况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on is this whole mission is one big rat-fuck. We've been stuck here for way too long with no results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在的状况就是，这整个任务是个天大的笑话。我们陷入了泥潭中，长时间没有进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw won't give up, so we've stooped to using chumps like you to try and get something out of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳不会放弃的，所以我们才会降低要求使用像你这种傻瓜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry for asking. Forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉这么问。忘了我说的话吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got loads of problems, chump. You don't want to become one, so shut up and get in the... the simulator thing there. Move it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有成堆的麻烦，废物。你别再给我添乱了，闭嘴，进那…模拟器去。快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么总是充满敌意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we ain't gonna be friends when this is all over, so the less talking we do now the happier I am, got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当这一切结束后我们是不可能做朋友的，所以我们越少说话，我就越高兴，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why exactly do you need me?
The simulation needs an external interface device to run correctly. I'm not exactly sure why, the records on that are spotty at best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟程序需要一个外部接口设备来正确运行。我不大清楚这是为什么，关于此事的记录根本含糊不清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We figured out that your Pip-Boy there will suffice. Since you're kind of attached to it, you go along with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们发现你的哔哔小子能满足条件。既然你戴着它，就由你去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should be fine... Assuming you can actually get some results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该没事的…假如你真能弄出一些结果的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I suppose if you don't mind us hacking off your forearm, we don't really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是你不介意我们把你前臂剁下来，我们才不需要你呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The sim is looking for an external interface. I haven't quite figured out why, but there's no way to bypass it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟程序需要一个外部接口。我没弄明白那是为什么，但也没办法绕开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Pip-Boy there is a match. So since you're the one wearing it, you're the one running through the simulation. Get it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那哔哔小子完全符合。既然你戴着它，就由你去进行模拟程序。懂了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about what you're doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我更多关于你在这儿的工作吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same thing we're always doing: Locating technology, preserving it, and making sure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是我们一直在做的事情：找到科技所在，把它保存好，确保它不会落入敌手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw thinks there's something of value here. I know not everyone agrees, but based on what I've seen I think he's right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳认为这里还有些有用的东西。我知道并不是人人都赞同，但依我所见，我认为他是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're doing our jobs. Locating technology, preserving it, and making sure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在做本职工作。找到科技所在，把它保存好，确保它不会落入敌手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone has to safeguard the future of the human race, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总得有人去保护人类的未来，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw thinks there's something of value here. I know not everyone agrees, but based on what I've seen I think he's right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳认为这里还有些有用的东西。我知道并不是人人都赞同，但依我所见，我认为他是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The same thing we always do. Recover technology and preserve it, making sure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是我们一直在做的事情：找到科技所在，把它保存好，确保它不会落入敌手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw's hope is that whatever's in here will give us a big advantage. I'm not convinced, but I'm on his side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳希望不论这里有什么，都能让我们受益无穷。我不大相信这个，但我站在他那边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about this simulation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于这种模拟，你能告诉我些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you know? This sim had to have been one of the most important of its time -- it's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from the Chinese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道？这个程序展示了那个时代最重要的事件之一 — 从中国人手里解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not up on your history, huh? Back before the world was nuked, the Chinese had invaded Anchorage, Alaska. That really amped things up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没听过这段历史吧？在世界被核武器毁灭之前，中国曾经入侵过阿拉斯加的安克雷奇，让事态急速升温。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, the Americans went in and liberated the city, but there were heavy losses. This simulation trained soldiers for that engagement!
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，美国人出兵解放了城市，但付出了沉重的代价。这个模拟程序就是为那次战斗训练士兵用的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, the technology here is impressive, but something's a bit off. Records suggest even some of the people who built this didn't understand it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，这里的科技令人叹为观止，但有些东西过于玄妙了。据记载，有些建造这东西的人都无法理解它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Sigh* I find your level of ignorance disgusting... if not unexpected.
ESP.TRADUIT: *叹气* 你的无知让我感到恶心…那也是意料之中的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This sim had to have been one of the most important of its time -- it's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from the Chinese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个程序展示了那个时代最重要的事件之一 — 从中国人手里解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, the Americans went in and liberated the city, but there were heavy losses. This simulation trained soldiers for that engagement!
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，美国人出兵解放了城市，但付出了沉重的代价。这个模拟程序就是为那次战斗训练士兵用的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, you must brush up on your history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，你该复习一下历史了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, chump. You're here because McGraw says we need you. You're not here to make small talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，废物。你能待在这儿只是因为麦格劳说我们需要你。不是让你来谈天的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're sure as hell not here to get anything out of me, so quit trying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从我这儿铁定得不到什么的，省省吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, look. I'm just trying to get some more information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，听着，我只是想多获取点信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, hurry up then. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那你快点。你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I get it. You're doing the "tough" routine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我明白了。你在摆“强硬”姿态。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Is that some kind of joke?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you're only here because McGraw says we need you. Otherwise we'd have you on security outside, with the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能待在这里只是因为麦格劳说我们需要你。不然就让你跟其他人一样，到外面站岗去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Is that some kind of joke?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you're only here because McGraw says we need you. Otherwise you'd be out on your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能待在这里只是因为麦格劳说我们需要你。不然你压根进不来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice attitude. This how you treat everyone that tries to help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好态度。你就这么对待想帮助你的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until you actually do something that helps us out, you're just one more liability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你真能帮上我们，否则你就是个累赘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you're going to help out, then that's great. Just don't get in my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，如果你要帮忙，那很好。不过别来烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, slow down! Can we just talk for a bit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嚯，慢着！我们能谈一会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I... I'm sorry. Things have been tense here lately, and I'm afraid it's getting the better of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我…我很抱歉。最近事态有点紧张，恐怕我有点应付不过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shouldn't be taking it out on you. Did you need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不该向你发牢骚的。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncle Sam's invested a lot of money turning you into a killing machine... time to pay him back. Dismissed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆大叔投资了很多钱把你变成杀人机器... 是时候物有所用了。解散。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lieutenant Morgan will be your eyes and ears for Operation Anchorage, so get everything else you need from him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摩根中尉将会是安克雷奇行动的耳目，有需要就去找他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me warn you now. Unless you have some sort of a death wish, I wouldn't even go near the field until the first two targets are down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告在先：在除掉前两个目标之前，不要靠近战场，除非你活得不耐烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to cross it then cause it to overload so we can mop up the place with the T-51b's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须越过它，然后使它超载，我们就可以派T-51b部队去清场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the first two targets are down, the last obstacle standing in the way is their damn Pulse Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦除掉了前两个目标，最后一道障碍就是他们那该死的脉冲场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to clear the place of personnel so we can get our intelligence boys in there to start decoding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须清除那里的敌人，我们的情报人员才能进去开始解码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your second target is all the way over here. The Chinese have set up a listening post set into the side of Calliway Ridge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的第二个目标则在这里。中国军队在卡拉威山脊 建立了一个监听站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you breach the perimeter of the Depot, you need to take out both of the main fuel tanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你攻破了兵站外围，就要摧毁两座主燃料罐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first of the three targets we need to handle is their Chimera Depot over here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要摧毁三个目标，第一个是他们在这里的奇美拉维修站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've set up our new Field H.Q. down here. The area is pretty secure now that the Artillery Guns are gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已在此设立了新的战地指挥部。火炮已除，现在这里很安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... pay attention, soldier. I'm only going to go through this once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…注意听好，士兵。我只说一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Sentry Bot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他们派个哨兵机器人来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's on its way from the motor pool as we speak, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它正在从车辆的调配场赶来，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Mister Gutsy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他们派个“勇敢”先生来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Command will send it right out to us, sir.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Sniper.

ESP.TRADUIT: 他们很快就会到来，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Missile Unit.
Missile Unit on its way, sir.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Grenadier.
No problem, they should arrive shortly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，他们很快就会到达。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us an Infantryman.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radio to base that we need replacements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用电台联络基地，说我们需要补充兵源。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can do. What unit should we request?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以。我们需要什么单位？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have the Strike Team head for the Listening Post.
Have the Strike Team head for the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让突击组前往奇美拉维修站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's our current status on the targets?
As soon as we take out the Pulse Field, I'll radio Chase to send in the shock troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我们除掉脉冲场，我会发报给蔡斯，让他派突击部队来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're wearing the T-51b Power Armor. We'll see how well the Reds handle all of us charging into their headquarters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们穿着T-51b动力装甲。看看我们一起冲进红军的总部时，他们有何能耐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuel tanks at the Chimera Depot need to be destroyed. Then we can move on to deactivating the Pulse Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得先摧毁奇美拉维修站的燃料罐，然后就可以前去解除脉冲场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Listening Post still needs to be secured, and then the Pulse Field needs to be deactivated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们仍需肃清监听站，然后还要解除脉冲场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, they're pretty much untouched. The Listening Post needs to be secured and the fuel tanks at the Chimera Depot need to be destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，他们基本上还完好无损。我们得先肃清监听站，并摧毁奇美拉维修站的燃料罐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, after all that's done, the Pulse Field still needs to be deactivated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，那些搞定后，还得解除脉冲场。
