ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's do this smooth and by the numbers. Follow my lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要迅速解决战斗，跟我来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. What are your orders?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get the Strike Team moving, Sergeant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让突击组行动起来，中士！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. What are your orders?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, where do we stand with the Strike Team?
Everyone's ready to go kick some Commie ass... sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵们都准备好杀敌了…长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got to take out that goddamned sniper! We're pinned in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得干掉那个该死的狙击手！我们被困在这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07004A52] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : (frantic) pissed at his friend's death (emphasize God Damned) EmotionType : Anger
NPC : American Soldier [07004A52] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : startled as his buddy McKinney's head explodes from sniper fire EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's up on that ridge. Right over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就在那山坡上。就在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07004A4F] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : (frantic) spotted a sniper and convinced he can take him out before he gets shot EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: McKinney! Jesus! You got a death wish?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦金尼！上帝啊！你找死啊？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07004A52] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : (frantic) shocked his buddy is sticking his head out where a sniper can get him EmotionType : Fear
NPC : American Soldier [07004A4F] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : (frantic) spotting a sniper EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : American Soldier [07004A52] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : (frantic) warning approaching ally that a sniper is in the area EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : American Soldier [07004A52] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : (frantic) warning approaching ally that a sniper is in the area EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough. McGraw's in charge, so we follow his orders, no matter how much we don't like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了。麦格劳是头儿，所以我们服从他的命令，就算我们多不愿意都要服从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, man. How long you gonna let McGraw screw us over like this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，伙计。你还要让麦格劳像这样搞多久？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, this is the last thing we need...
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，这就是我们想要的最后一件东西…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw gave orders. It's that simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳下的命令。就这么简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea. Stay sharp, but don't open fire without my order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不清楚。保持警惕，但没有我的命令不许开火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...all I'm saying is, why can't we just ice the guy and use his computer ourselves?
ESP.TRADUIT: …我所说的是，为何不能把这小伙子冰冻起来，让我们自己来使用他的电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...all I'm saying is, why can't we just ice the chick and use the computer ourselves?
ESP.TRADUIT: …我所说的是，为何不能把这小姑娘冰冻起来，让我们自己来使用她的电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...like I said, Morrill should be up top. So who the hell's in the elevator?
ESP.TRADUIT: …我说过了，莫里尔应该就在最上面。那么到底是谁在电梯里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're dismissed from the Strike Team, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被逐出突击组了，士兵。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack the Enemy Camp when ready, Sarge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好了就攻击敌人营地，中士。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir, I'm going to say again that I don't like this idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官，再说一次，我不喜欢这主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, Defender. Give us a moment, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，守卫。你可以离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here she is, Protector. Like you asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她来了，护卫，如你吩咐的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here he is, Protector. Like you asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他来了，护卫，如你吩咐的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll be all, Defender. Thank you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, like I said, sorry Sir. Not my fault he ran in here. Listen, I still don't think this is a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我说了，对不起，长官。他跑进来，不是我的错。听着，我还是认为这不是个好主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, like I said, sorry Sir. Not my fault she ran in here. Listen, I still don't think this is a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我说了，对不起，长官。她跑进来，不是我的错。听着，我还是认为这不是个好主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were supposed to keep an eye on our guest, Defender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你本应该看着我们的客人的，守卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, sir. Here he is, like you asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，长官。照你所说的，他来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, sir. Here she is, like you asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，长官。照你所说的，她来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Through this next structure is the entrance to the Artillery Base. I dunno what they got waiting for us, so keep a sharp watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过了这个后，下一个建筑物就是大炮基地的入口。不知道会有什么等着我们，所以都给我加倍留神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I live just one more day without seeing another catwalk, I'll die a happy man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不用再和这些狭小通道打交道，我就死而无憾了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're crossing that pipe? And here I thought I was the one with the death wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要穿过那个管道？我还以为只有我一个人不怕死呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyes on, we got company up ahead!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woah... watch your step near those ledges. That is a HELL of a long fall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇…在那些悬崖附近要小心。在那么高的地方摔下来可不是好玩的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha ha! And they all come tumbling down! Yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！他们都在屁滚尿流呢！耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's two. Let's finish the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那有两个。我们来搞定它吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yeah! Take that you Red bastards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的！尝尝这个，你们这群杂种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last gun! Blow that thing off the map!
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一门大炮！把那玩意炸飞吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plant that thing and let's go!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alrighty chief... we got three of those things to take down. You lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，长官…我们要摧毁3个目标。请带路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the Front down there. These guns are pounding on our guys. Let's take 'em out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那下面就是前门了。这些大炮一直在轰炸我们的部队。我们去摧毁它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah.... so I was wrong. Let's keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，嗯…原来我错了。我们继续走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Looks like the Commies are getting low on ammo for the big guns. Maybe we didn't even need to come up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。看来中共的大炮没多少弹药了。可能我们都不用来这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There! See 'em down there? That's their damn Chimera tanks. Don't worry, they're well out of range.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那！看到下面了吗？那就是该死的奇美拉坦克。别担心，我们现在并不在射程之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the entrance. Place is probably swarming with Reds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是入口。可能到处都是红军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll scope out the enemy at the Mining Town. Have the team wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去侦察一下矿镇的敌军。让队伍等在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll scope out the enemy at the Listening Post. Have the team wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去侦察一下监听站的敌军。让队伍等在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll scope out the enemy at the Ice Camp. Have the team wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去侦察一下冰雪营地的敌军。让队伍等在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll scope out the enemy at the Chimera Depot. Have the team wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去侦察一下奇美拉维修站的敌军。让队伍等在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Mining Town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻矿镇的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack the enemy in the Mines.
Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻监听站的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack the enemy in the Listening Post.
Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Ice Camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻冰雪营地的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack the enemy in the Ice Camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击冰雪营地中的敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻奇美拉维修站的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack the enemy in the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击奇美拉维修站中的敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Send Team to Rally Point: Mines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 派遣队伍前往集合点：矿井。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Mining Town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在矿镇等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait for me just outside the Mining Town on the way to the Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在去监听站路上的矿镇外等我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done with Ice Camp. Send Team to Rally Point: Chimera.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冰雪营地清剿完毕。派遣队伍前往集合点：奇美拉维修站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在奇美拉维修站等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that the Ice Camp is out of the way, head up to the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然冰雪营地已经解决，前往奇美拉维修站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done with Mines. Send Team to Rally Point: Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 矿井清剿完毕。派遣队伍前往集合点：监听站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在监听站等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that we've dealt with the Mining Town, head to the Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然矿镇已经解决，前往监听站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Send Team to Rally Point: Ice Camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 派遣队伍前往集合点：冰雪营地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Ice Camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在冰雪营地等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait for me outside the Chinese Ice Camp on the way to the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在前往奇美拉维修站路上的中国军队冰雪营地外等我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I done? Is the simulation over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完成了？ 模拟结束了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got an attitude problem, soldier, and this simulation is going to recommend a swift kick in the ass to correct it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的态度有问题，士兵，模拟程序建议我踢爆你的屁股纠正你的态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, you've more than made up for it by recovering important enemy intel and exposing their plans to us so I'll overlook your attitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，你取得了敌军重要情报、揭露了他们的计划，将功补过，我可以原谅你的态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you've completed the training, it's time to report to your commanding officer for your debriefing. Dismissed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你完成训练了，那就是时候去向你的指挥官报到听取简报了。解散！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got an attitude problem, soldier, and this simulation is going to recommend a swift kick in the ass to correct it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的态度有问题，士兵，模拟程序建议我踢爆你的屁股来纠正你的态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you've completed the training, it's time to report to your commanding officer for your debriefing. Dismissed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你完成训练了，那就该去向你的指挥官报到听取简报了。解散！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, that's it? I was just starting to have fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，这就玩了？ 我刚开始觉得有点意思。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This concludes the simulation, and this portion of your training. But if you're thirsty for more, soldier, your commanding officer can oblige.
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟程序以及你的本部分训练均告结束。但如果你想进行更多的训练，你的指挥官会满足你的要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've shown that you've got what it takes. There's a possible promotion in your future, if you keep your head on straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你表现得很出色。保持下去，你的前途无限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've also gone above and beyond the call of duty by recovering important enemy intel and exposing their plans to us. Again, well done soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还超常履行了军人的职责，获取了敌军重要情报、揭露了他们的计划。再说一次，做得好，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work, soldier. When you exit the simulation, report to your superiors for debriefing. Dismissed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你训练的这一部分结束了。离开模拟程序后，向你的上级报到听取简报。解散！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This concludes the simulation, and this portion of your training. But if you're thirsty for more, soldier, your commanding officer can oblige.
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟程序以及你的本部分训练均告结束。但如果你想进行更多的训练，你的指挥官会满足你的要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've shown that you've got what it takes. There's a possible promotion in your future, if you keep your head on straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你表现得很出色。保持下去，你的前途无限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work, soldier. When you exit the simulation, report to your superiors for debriefing. Dismissed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，士兵。离开模拟程序后，向你的上级报到听取简报。解散！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the General's death, our boys can secure this refinery and be on their way to Anchorage proper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将军一死，我们的士兵就能攻占精炼厂，光复安克雷奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've helped pave the way for taking the city back from the Reds, soldier. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为我们从红军手里夺回城市铺平了道路，士兵。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've also gone above and beyond the call of duty by recovering important enemy intel and exposing their plans to us. Again, well done soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还超常履行了军人的职责，获取了敌军重要情报、揭露了他们的计划。再说一次，做得好，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll complete this portion of your training. Report to your superior for debriefing and your next assignment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你训练的这一部分结束了。向你的上级报到听取简报，准备下一项任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the General's death, our boys can secure this refinery and be on their way to Anchorage proper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将军一死，我们的士兵就能攻占精炼厂，光复安克雷奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've helped pave the way for taking the city back from the Reds, soldier. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为我们从红军手里夺回城市铺平了道路，士兵。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll complete this portion of your training. Report to your superior for debriefing and your next assignment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你训练的这一部分结束了。向你的上级报到听取简报，准备下一项任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are some abandoned mines along the route, so keep your eyes and ears open. It's a great place for an ambush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路线上有一些废弃的矿井，保持高度警惕。那可是伏击的绝佳地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful on your approach, you're going to have to get through the Enemy Camp on the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接近时要小心点，你会经过敌人营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: About damn time the reinforcements showed up! Fall in, soldier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 援军来的正是时候！冲啊，士兵们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got multiple hostiles between here and the base camp. We're sweeping the area to secure it. Let's move!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里到敌营之间有很多敌军。我们正在横扫此处消灭敌人。出发！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a death wish, walking through a war zone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就这么横穿战区，不想活了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, local, if you want to be of use, help us clear the mutants between here and our base camp. If not, stay the hell out of our way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，本地人，如果你想发挥点作用，帮我们清除这里和我们营地之间的变种人。否则就给我滚远一点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, then get out and let me do my job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，那就走开，让我好干活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, whatever. Just make some progress, okay? We're all looking to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，随便吧。弄点进展出来，好吧？我们正等着离开这里呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to hell, Sibley. You know that wasn't my fault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去死吧，西布利。你知道那不是我的错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep. Let's hope you treat this one better than the last guy, huh? Heh heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。希望你对待这个人比对上一个好点，哼？嘿嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knock knock, Olin. Got a new best friend for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在吗，奥林。向你介绍一个新的好朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The stuff you have is okay, but I need something with more... punch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给的玩意儿都还行，但我需要一些更…带劲的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, you earned a lot of respect with the soldiers for what you did to those Chinese artillery guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他呢，你摧毁了那些中国军队火炮，赢得了很多士兵的尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what... take this extra gear with you, requisitions be damned. If anyone asks, it fell off a truck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧…拿上这个附加装备吧，去他的申请表。如果有人问到，就说是从卡车上掉下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Physician's Log, Doctor Adrienn Adami, United States Army, Anchorage, Alaska forward base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 内科医生日志，艾德林·奥达米医生，美国陆军，安克雷奇，阿拉斯加前线基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Considering what's at stake, General Chase and I both feel the chem codenamed "Psycho" can be of significant use during this operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到目前的危机，蔡斯将军和我都认为在此次行动中可大规模使用代号为 疯狂药的化学药品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've read the early clinical trials, and there are certainly some possible side effects -- dementia, psychotic aggression. And of course addiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这之前我读过临床实验报告，当然会有些可能的副作用 -- 导致痴呆或者具有攻击倾向。当然还会上瘾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the adverse effects do seem limited. Okay, I do realize the chem was developed by Chase's R&D division, but if the thing works it works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但反作用看起来确实有限。好吧，我的确意识到这种药物是蔡斯的研发部门开发出来的，但如果它有效的话就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we really afford to be picky at this point? Some of these groundpounders have family in Anchorage. I'll give them any boost I damn well can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不要在这一点上争论不休好不好？这些人当中在安克雷奇是有家庭的。我会尽最大努力的鼓励他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just hope my Hippocratic Oath is still speaking to me when this whole mess is over with...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望当这一切都结束时我的《希波克拉底誓言》还有用…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Molly, I'm... I'm okay. Everything's fine. I was found, but not by the Chinese. It was the Captain, he found me. Cap says everything will be okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫利，我科学怪人我没事。一切安好。有人找到我了，但不是中国人，是队长，他找到了我。队长说一切都会没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been a few hours, and I'm tired, but I wanted to let you know I'm all right. I'm in the refinery now, resting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过了几个小时了，我有点累，但我想告诉你我很好。我现在正在精炼厂里休息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cap brought me here. We snuck around the Chinese and made it in. It's the last place they haven't taken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是队长把我带到这里的。我们躲过了中国人来到这里。这是他们唯一没有占领的地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got... I got shot, Molly. In the shoulder. And back. When Cap and I evacuated the mountain. It's not bad. Just a few bullets. Souvenirs, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…中枪了，莫利，肩膀和背上。就在我和队长撤退到山里的时候。不算太糟，就中了几颗子弹而已，还可以当成纪念品呢，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cap jabbed me with a bunch of meds, so I can't feel much of anything anymore. He patched me up pretty good, too. Still bleedin', but that'll stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 队长给我打了几剂医疗针，现在感觉有点麻木。他还给我包扎得很好。还有点出血，但很快就会止住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can hear Cap and the others out in the yard, fighting. So much gunfire. They'll kill those Chinese bastards, and then we can all come home...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以听到队长和其他人正在外面的院子里战斗着。枪声很激烈。他们会杀光那些中国杂种，然后我们就都可以回家了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, Molly... I'm sorry. I am so sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，莫利…对不起。真对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't do this. I'm so afraid, Molly. I don't want to die. Oh my God, I don't want to die...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我坚持不住了。我很害怕，莫利。我不想死。天哪，我不想死…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We held them as long as we could, I swear we did. Then Ciello asked for a magazine, and when I turned to give it to him, a shell hit, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们竭尽全力抵挡他们，我发誓我们确实这样做了。那时候切罗向我要一个弹夹，当我要拿给他时，一个炮弹打了过来，然后…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's gone, Molly. He was there one second, and then he wasn't. His blood... and, and... bits of him... Ohh... my God, he's all over me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死了，莫利。前一秒钟他还在那里，后一秒他就不在了。他的血…还有，还有他的…断手断脚…哦…我的天，散落在我周围！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, please, please, let them leave, let them leave, let them leave. I just want to come home. I just want to be with you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝啊，求求你，求你了，求你了，让他们走，让他们走，让他们走吧。我只想回家。我只想再回到你身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hiding now. The Chinese are everywhere. I'm a coward, I'm a coward I know. But I don't care. If they find me, I'm surrendering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在躲了起来。到处都是中国人。我是个胆小鬼，我知道我是个胆小鬼。但我不在乎。如果被他们发现了，我就投降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Captain Zachary Lloyd, United States Army, Anchorage, Alaska security detachment!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是扎卡里·劳埃德上尉，美国陆军，安克雷奇，阿拉斯加防卫特遣队！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are approximately two hours into the Chinese assault on this outpost!
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队已经连续2个小时不断进攻我们这个前哨了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are being shelled non-stop, indiscriminately! The entire base is under bombardment from the Chinese ships, and they don't care who they hit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们遭到不停的地毯式轰炸！整个基地都遭到来自中国军舰的炮击，而且他们不分敌我胡乱开炮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All accounts indicate they've actually killed more of their own men than ours! They just do not seem to care about their own troops, at all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有情报表明他们已经杀了不少自己人，比他们杀我们的人还要多！他们好像完全不在乎自己的士兵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: At this rate, the entire mountain will be a graveyard in less than an hour, and then the Chinese will just move in and set up shop!
ESP.TRADUIT: 照这样下去，在不到一个小时之内，整座山头就会尸横遍野了，然后中国军队就会冲进来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: God help us! God help America!
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝保佑我们！上帝保佑美利坚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Captain Zachary Lloyd, United States Army, Anchorage, Alaska security detachment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是扎卡里·劳埃德中尉，美国陆军，安克雷奇，阿拉斯加防卫特遣队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Approximately 23 minutes ago, Chinese Communist forces set foot on Anchorage soil, despite our soldiers' best efforts to prevent that landing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约23分钟之前，中国军队冲破我们士兵的全力防守，踏上安克雷奇的领土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As expected, the Chinese have launched a two-pronged attack - one aimed at occupying Anchorage proper, and the other at securing this base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我们所料的，中国军队兵分两路发起进攻 - 其中一路目标是攻占安克雷奇本身，另一路则是攻占本基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to our entrenchment, U.S. casualties here on the mountain are currently minimal, but that's not going to last for long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得益于我们坚固的防御工事，目前美军在山上边的伤亡在最小限度内，但坚持不了太长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's not going to last for long. Chinese reinforcements appear to be... endless. It's just a matter of time before we're overrun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但坚持不了太长时间。中国军队的援兵看起来好像…源源不绝。我们被击溃只是时间问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll die today, but by God we'll give those Communist sonsabitches a black eye they'll never forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天我们难免一死，但上帝会保佑我们给予杂种中共一次永生难忘的羞辱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Molly, I hope this tape gets to you, someway, somehow. I don't have a lot of time, but you need to know what happened to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫利，我希望你有机会收到这盒带子。我没什么时间了，但我想让你知道我的经历。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The early reports weren't bullshit. The Chinese are here. As in, they're invading Anchorage, in force. Right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前的报告还算准确。中国军队确实在此。他们正在武力入侵安克雷奇。就是现在！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the real deal. It makes Pearl Harbor look like an academy exercise. I've never seen so many goddamned warships.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这回可是来真的。日军偷袭珍珠港事件与它相比，简直是小巫见大巫了。我从没见过这么多的军舰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sergeant Lowry has ordered the platoon to assemble in the mess in fifteen minutes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 劳里中士已经下令全排士兵在15分钟内到前线集结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The plan is to dig in on the cliffs, and slow the Chinese advance until the civilian contractors can evacuate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行动计划是在悬崖上挖掘工事，拖慢中国军队的前进速度，以使平民安全撤离。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then... Then we hold the line, for as long as we can. I talked to Durney, Ciello and Dallas, and we all agreed - surrender is not an option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后…我们守住防线，守得越久越好。我和德尼、切罗、达拉斯谈过了，一致同意：宁死不降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never told you, but... that night in Cleveland? On the ferris wheel? That was when I fell in love with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没告诉过你，但是…还记得在克利夫兰，弗雷斯大转轮上的那一晚吗？从那一晚开始，我就爱上了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Private First Class Henry Hodges, signing out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一等兵亨利·霍奇斯，留言结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, put me in the chair.
Okay, guess I'll get to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想我会着手去做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, good luck. And don't worry -- we'll be right here when you get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，祝你好运。对了，别担心 — 你出来的时候我们仍会在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't forget to put the Neural Interface suit on first. We can't hook you up until you're wearing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别忘了先把神经接口服穿上。否则我们没法将你接入系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, great. The sooner you're done, the sooner we can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，太棒了。你越快完成，我们就能越早离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: First you need to put on the Neural Interface suit, and then you can get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要先穿上神经接口服，才能继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someplace you locals ain't supposed to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们本地人不该来的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, ah... Since you're down here, let's go have a chat with the boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，啊…既然你下来了，我们去和头儿谈谈吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice place you've got here. Mind if I look around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这儿真是个好地方。介意我随便转转吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Matter of fact, I do mind. I mind enough to put a few rounds in you. Get me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我很介意。介意到想让你尝几颗子弹。懂了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and me, we're going to see the boss, so he can decide what to do with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我，我们一起去见头儿，好决定如何处置你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoops, this isn't the Vault. Silly me, must've made a wrong turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呦，这不是避难所。我真傻，一定是转错弯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You a wiseass, or just stupid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个机灵鬼，还是个白痴？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, stupid, let's go see the boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，白痴，我们去见头儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, sweetie. I'm kind of lost. Can I talk to whomever's in charge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，甜心。我有点迷路了。我能和管事的谈一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, sure. Sure thing, miss. I'll take you to Protector McGraw right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当然。当然，小姐。我立即带你去见护卫麦格劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough! There has to be a way to halt this simulation. A passcode or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！ 肯定有办法来暂停这场模拟战。 一个口令或什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simulation? What the hell are you talking about? This is as real as it gets, G.I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟？你在说什么？这里是现实，大兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: And thanks to you, a lot of guys are still vertical. Those artillery guns were pounding the crap out of our soldiers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了你，很多人活了下来。之前那些没完没了的火炮打得我们透不过气来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't even presume to argue with this simulation's A.I. subroutines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不会去跟这个模拟程序的人工智能子程序争论呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Subroutines? This is an Army gig, not the Navy. You sure those artillery guns going off didn't shake something loose up there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 子程序？这是一种陆军导弹，不是海军的。你肯定那些大炮没把什么东西轰下来吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... we all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着…我们都想结束这一切。没人自愿待在这里。当破事开始时，我们就把一切抛诸脑后了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the guys out here are falling apart. We need guys like you to keep them focused; make them think they're going to get home one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有些人开始崩溃了，需要你这样的人让他们振作起来，让他们怀有归乡的期盼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just drop the whole thing, okay?
Fine. I guess we have a job to do, so let's get to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。我想我们有事做了，出发吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose. Let's just get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相是的。我们，快结束这事吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. We WILL get through this. I'll be there every step of the way to give you a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。我们会结束这事的。我会一直在旁边提供帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你说得对。很抱歉，本杰！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now onto bigger and better things, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在有更宏伟的目标了，唉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: These soldiers aren't even real. This is all a sham.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些士兵根本就不是真人，都是些虚拟的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, this place must really be getting to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢，这地方对你打击不小啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... we all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着…我们都想结束这一切。没人自愿待在这里。当破事开始时，我们就把一切抛诸脑后了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the guys out here are falling apart. We need guys like you to keep them focused; make them think they're going to get home one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有些人开始崩溃了，需要你这样的人让他们振作起来，让他们怀有归乡的期盼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never asked to be a role model. I just want to get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没想过做大家的榜样。 我只是想快点结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都想结束这一切。没人自愿待在这里。当破事开始时，我们就把一切抛诸脑后了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the guys out here are falling apart. We need guys like you to keep them focused; make them think they're going to get home one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有些人开始崩溃了，需要你这样的人让他们振作起来，让他们怀有归乡的期盼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, Benji. I'll make officers out of all of 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用担心，Benji。我会把他们都培养成指挥官。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now onto bigger and better things, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在有更宏伟的目标了，唉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You save some, you lose others. Who cares as long as the job gets done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有得必有失，只要能完成任务，谁会在意呢？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lemme take a close look at you. Hmmm. Nope, I don't see any tin plating. You don't look like a robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我仔细瞧瞧你。嗯。没有，我没看到你身上有什么金属零件。你不像是个机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on. You have no idea what kind of a role model you are for these boys. They look up to you now. You need to set an example.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托。你不知道你在大伙儿眼中有多么伟大。他们现在很敬仰你。你要以身作则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All in a day's work, Benji.
All in a day's work he says. Yeah sure... every day I wake up and single-handedly infiltrate a Commie infested base on a suicide mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说这是家常便饭。嗯，当然…每天我起床就孤身潜入中共巢穴，进行自杀式任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With a role model like you, our boys are gonna turn into killing machines!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有你这样的榜样，我们的士兵会变成杀人机器！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess I did kind of save the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想我算是扭转了的局面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh ho! Listen to this guy!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : said in a friendly, needling way EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of a role model do you expect to be for your men with that kind of hot air coming out of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你这番大话，会给自己的同伴树立什么样的榜样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : said in a friendly, needling way EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't have me killed if you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你死了你就不能杀我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try me, reject. Ouutcassttsss! Hostile in base!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放马过来，废物。放逐者！基地里有敌人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm just here to help. I heard your radio broadcast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我只是来这儿帮忙的。我听到了你们的电台信号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you're certainly not the help that Morrill had in mind, but from the looks of you, you might be useful in other ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当然不是起着莫里尔所想的那种作用，但从你的外表看来，你在其他某些方面有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just exploring. I didn't mean to intrude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在探索。我不是故意闯入的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Under different circumstances, that wouldn't be nearly enough of an explanation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在不同的情况下，那还不能构成一个解释。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... I think you can be helpful, and so I'll overlook it for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…我想你是有用的，现在我就可以预见到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you tell them that if they want their viable liberation contingency ready in case Operation: Anchorage fails, they need to get off their asses!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你告诉他们如果想在安克雷奇行动失败时准备好可行的方案，他们就得马上动身！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, tell those men they need to be ready. As soon as the Pulse Field is down, we need them cocked, locked and ready to rock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，让那些人准备好。一旦脉冲场关掉后，要他们立即出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, good. Keep monitoring the battlefield and let me know when we've punched through the Pulse Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好。继续监控战场，突破脉冲场立刻告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry sir, they said the technicians are still dragging their heels a bit on the fusion power plant issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，长官，他们说技术人员还在忙着修理核融发电站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The T-51b units are at 95 percent readiness level. We've had a bit of trouble adapting them to the cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: T-51b部队已有95%准备就绪了。他们在适应寒冷气候时遇到一点困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd say about 20 percent, sir. But that number significantly decreases if we can get the tin cans in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以说是20%了，长官。如果我们能把动力装甲部队送进去，这个数字会显著降低。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got some equipment in need of repairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些需要修理的装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally I'd never consider this, but I probably wouldn't be alive if it weren't for you. I'd say that warrants an exception.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般情况下我不会考虑此事，但没有你的帮忙我可能已经死了。所以可以破一下例。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's take a look.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see what I can do.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should be able to help.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right boys, I'm going to make you famous. Get yourselves into a heroic pose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，孩子们，我要让你们扬名天下了。给我摆个英雄的姿势出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. That's it. Just like that. Hold still.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent! The Capital Post thanks you! Who knows, maybe someone will turn this photo into a statue one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！《首都邮报》感谢你们！说不定哪天会有人用这张照片做一座雕像呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you boys try not to die out there, okay? God bless you, and God bless the U.S. of A!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，你们这些年轻人可要努力活下来啊，好吗？上帝保佑你们，上帝保佑美利坚合众国！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: There we go. Stay safe out there, okay?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : doctor encourage a healed patient to get back into the fight EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All patched up. Now get back into the fight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 都包扎好了。现在回去战斗吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : doctor encourage a healed patient to get back into the fight EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're fine now. Just be careful out there, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在好了。小心行动，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : doctor encourage a healed patient to get back into the fight EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : Confrontational as in "Yeah, maybe you should." EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you guys are almost as fun to kill as the mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你们这些家伙杀起来几乎和变种人一样有趣。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, hell of a fight. Mind if I head in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，一场苦战。介意我加入吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, of course. Go on through.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clear, but the pet Frankenstein stays up here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以过去了，但你的宠物科学怪人得留在这儿…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, but the zombie stays here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，但这个丧尸得留在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem, but your friend stays topside with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，但你的朋友得和我留在上面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，但机器人得留在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but Lyons' woman stays topside. You head in. Alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，但里昂斯的女人得留在上面。你一个人进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but make sure that stray pooch doesn't tag along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，但你要确保那条野狗不会乱跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, of course. Go on through.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, but your pet Frankenstein stays here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，但你的宠物科学怪人要留在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, but the zombie stays up here, where I can keep an eye on it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，但丧尸要留在这里，我要看着它…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem, but your friend stays topside with me.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but Lyons' woman stays topside. You head in. Alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，但里昂斯的女人在最上面。你一个人进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but make sure that stray pooch doesn't tag along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，但你要确保那条野狗不会乱跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morrill radioed ahead. I'm supposed to meet Protector McGraw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫里尔在前边收发电台信号。我想应该会见到护卫麦格劳。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I heard about you. Behave yourself down there, or you'll have me to answer to on the way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我听说过你。在这下面你放规矩点，否则你出来时我会让你吃不了兜着走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clear to enter, but your pet Frankenstein stays here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以进去了，但你的宠物科学怪人得留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clear to enter, but the pet zombie stays up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以进去了，但你的宠物丧尸得留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head down, but the sidekick stays topside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下去吧，但你的伙伴得留在这上面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I got word to let you by. Can't take the bot with you, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我收到命令让你过去。但机器人得留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got some nerve bringing Lyons' bitch here. You go down. Alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然敢带里昂斯的婊子来这里，胆子不小啊。你只能一个人下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No dogs allowed. Head down, but leave the mutt with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不能进去。你下去，但把狗留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Go down and report to Protector McGraw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。下去向护卫麦格劳报到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Freak show stays, though. Report to Protector McGraw downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。但你的怪物要留下。去向楼下的护卫麦格劳报到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: About time. Report to Protector McGraw, but leave your friend with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来得真准时。去向护卫麦格劳报道，但你要把你的朋友留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get in the elevator, then. Robot stays topside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你进电梯去吧。把机器人留在上面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go report to Protector McGraw. I'm keeping an eye on your heretic. She stays with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去向护卫麦格劳报到。我会看着你带来的异教徒的。她得留在我这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Protector McGraw as soon as you get down there. I'll keep an eye on the dog while you're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一下去就向护卫麦格劳报到。我会帮你看着这条狗的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I heard about you. Behave yourself down there, or you'll have me to answer to on the way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我听说过你。到那下面放规矩点，否则你出来时我会让你吃不了兜着走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clear to enter, but leave your pet monster here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以进去了，但把你的宠物怪物留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head down, but the sidekick stays topside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下去吧，但把你的同伴留在这上面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I got word to let you by. Can't take the bot with you, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我收到命令让你过去。但机器人得留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got some nerve bringing Lyons' bitch here. You go down. Alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然敢带里昂斯的婊子来这里，胆子不小啊。你只能一个人下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No dogs allowed. Head down, but leave the mutt with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不能进去。你下去，但把狗留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. Let me guess, more psychotic little girls...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太好了。让我猜猜，那些太神经质的小女孩们……

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists. It was a pretty significant event in American history, according to our Scribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是从中国军队手中解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。根据我们的历史记载，这是美国历史上一个具有重要意义的事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're talking front line, heavy combat -- safety protocols disengaged. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们说的是在战场上，战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了…你的肉体的心跳也会停止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it's a computer game. I get it. Sounds like fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是一个电脑游戏。我明白了。听上去很有趣！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well it's not. It's a hyper-realistic military training simulation of the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不有趣。那是一种高真实度的军事训练模拟程序，模拟美军从中国军队手里解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is heavy combat -- safety protocols off. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest. Sim death... real death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了… 你的肉体的心跳也会停止。在模拟程序中死了…等于在现实中也死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be so sure. It's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists. A pretty significant event in American history, I'm told.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这么肯定。这是从中国军队手中解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。据说这是美国历史上一个具有重要意义的事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're talking front line, heavy combat -- safety protocols disengaged. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们说的是在战场上，战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了…你的肉体的心跳也会停止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've got a paying job, I'm in. What's the situation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有什么能付我钱的工作，我加入。什么情况？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, so you're a mercenary. Suddenly everything has become much clearer... All right, I'll get right to the point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，这么说来你是个佣兵。突然之间所有事情都清楚了…好吧，那我就直说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有记录显示这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's simulation program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface. Like your Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。就像你的哔哔小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. Do that, and you'll get a share of the gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。你成功后可分得一份装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You guys treat outsiders like shit, but you still beg for help. Typical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些家伙对待外来人像狗屎一样，但你仍然向他们祈求帮助。很有代表性。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I apologize for the gruffness of my men, but as you can see, everyone's under quite a bit of... duress. Maybe if I explain our situation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的人说话很没礼貌，真是抱歉，但你可以看到，每个人都有点…压力。介意我解释一下状况吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有记录显示这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's VR sim program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface. Like your Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。就像你的哔哔小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. Do that, and you'll get a share of the gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。你成功后可分得一份装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simulation? Like... a computer simulation? Of what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟？像是…电脑模拟？关于什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists. It was a pretty significant event in American history, according to our Scribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是从中国军队手中解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。根据我们的历史记载，这是美国历史上一个具有重要意义的事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't lie to you. It's heavy combat -- safety protocols disengaged. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不骗你。战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了…你的肉体的心跳也会停止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spit it out, McGraw. I ain't got all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有话快说，麦格劳。我可没时间陪你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasting your time, am I? You're in MY house, reject. You'd do well to remember that. Now shut up and listen. This could be worth your while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在浪费你的时间吗？你可是在我的地盘里，蠢货。你给我好好记住。现在给我闭嘴，仔细听好。这是很值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
